talentList.name: Sustaining Power
talentList.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

talentList.name: Extended Lightning
talentList.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%. ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. ❢ Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. ❢ Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds ❢ Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

talentList.name: Ruthless Momentum
talentList.description: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

talentList.name: Chaos Reigns
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. ❢ Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. ❢ Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. ❢ Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards. Bonus damage from Chaos Reigns is not affected by Scaling and Ability Power

talentList.name: Negatively Charged
talentList.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. ❢ Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

talentList.name: Show of Force
talentList.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 77 (+4% per level) damage.

talentList.name: Dissonance
talentList.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

talentList.name: Hindered Motion
talentList.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Applied Force
talentList.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

talentList.name: Deadly Charge
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

talentList.name: Counter-Strike
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

talentList.name: Blade of the Highlord
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

talentList.name: Pure Malice
talentList.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%. Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

talentList.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
talentList.description: Cooldown: 300 seconds Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds. Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death. There is no upper limit to Sadism gained through Rite of Rak'shir

talentList.name: Lethal Onslaught
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

talentList.name: Lightning Barrage
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

talentList.name: Mocking Strikes
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Counter-Strike
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage. This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

talentList.name: Deadly Charge
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

talentList.name: Last Laugh
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

talentList.name: Hasty Bargain
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities. Hasty Bargain can't be used, if Alarak doesn't have enough Sadism. Alarak's innate Sadism is cousumed first. Hasty Bargain can consume Sadism gained from Takedowns and Talents, if he run's out of innate Sadism.

talentList.name: Thunderstroke
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100 (+4% per level). ❢ Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a second charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15. Bonus damage from Thunderstroke is not affected by Scaling.

talentList.name: Seraph's Hymn
talentList.description: Reduce Blinding Light’s cooldown and Mana cost by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% bonus damage. This bonus damage stacks additively with Cassia's basic bonus damage against blinded targets.

talentList.name: Charged Strikes
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% for 8 seconds and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Inner Light
talentList.description: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location. This effect has a 6 second cooldown. Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%. Inner Light casts Blinding Light instantly with no delay. Inner Light's cooldown is separate from Blinding Light's.

talentList.name: Ring of the Leech
talentList.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

talentList.name: Plate of the Whale
talentList.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. ❢ Quest: For every 8 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. ❢ Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%. This talent applies healing instead of regeneration and ticks 1 per second. This healing is affected by Spell Power but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Impale
talentList.description: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

talentList.name: War Traveler
talentList.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 15%. This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

talentList.name: Surge of Light
talentList.description: Cooldown: 0.25 seconds Active: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

talentList.name: Ball Lightning
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

talentList.name: Valkyrie
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

talentList.name: Grounding Bolt
talentList.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Thundergod's Vigor
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

talentList.name: Lunging Strike
talentList.description: Increases Fend's range and area by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds. Increases total damage of Fend to 624 (+4% per level).

talentList.name: Pierce
talentList.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

talentList.name: Penetrate
talentList.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit Maximum damage increase to an untalented Fend is ~120%.

talentList.name: Martial Law
talentList.description: Basic attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health. Martial Law's damage is dealt in Ability Damage, but it is flagged to ignore any type of Armor.

talentList.name: Infinite Lightning
talentList.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit. It is possible to have multiple Ball Lightings up simultaneously

talentList.name: Imprisoning Light
talentList.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds. The root area is slightly bigger than that of Blinding Light's with the Inner Light Talent.

talentList.name: Titan's Revenge
talentList.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2. Titan's Revenge ignores all Armor effects, including increased and reduced Armor.

talentList.name: Mounting Sand
talentList.description: Increase the damage of Echo's Sand Blast by 50%. Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

talentList.name: Deep Breathing
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 5, up to 60. ❢ Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%. All bonus damage from Deep Breathing is affected by Ability Power, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to reveal a targeted area for 2 Seconds. Enemies are Revealed for 4 Seconds. ❢ Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes. ❢ Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 5% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.

talentList.name: Draconic Barrage
talentList.description: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talon to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.

talentList.name: Enveloping Assault
talentList.description: Increases Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

talentList.name: Timely Surprise
talentList.description: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

talentList.name: Mobius Loop
talentList.description: If Dragon's Breath hits a Hero, reduce is cooldown by 3 seconds and restore 100 Mana.

talentList.name: Dragon's Eye
talentList.description: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

talentList.name: Chrono Sickness
talentList.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Stasis ends, the enemy is also slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Slowing Sands
talentList.description: Cooldown: 5 seconds Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Temporal Loop
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

talentList.name: Bye Bye!
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

talentList.name: Here and There
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to have Chromie swap places with her Sand Blast Echo.

talentList.name: Time Out
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

talentList.name: Shifting Sands
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged with Sand Blast.

talentList.name: Fast Forward
talentList.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

talentList.name: Quantum Overdrive
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Pocket of Time
talentList.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 60% to 80%.

talentList.name: Stuck in a Loop
talentList.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

talentList.name: Piercing Sands
talentList.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant Quest progress

talentList.name: Andorhal Anomaly
talentList.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps. Upon placing 4th trap the oldest one disappears.

talentList.name: Gathering Storm
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5 and refund 10 Mana. Gathering Storm has no upper limit. Bonus damage from Gathering Storm is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Seasoned Marksman
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. ❢ Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds Continues to gain stacks even after the quest is completed. Bonus damage from Seasoned Marksman is affected by damage multipliers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Wingman
talentList.description: Active: Lower the cooldown of Lightning Rod by 3 seconds. Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks. Bosses and Support camps can't be bribed, but the Lightning Rod damage bonus works on them normally. There is no upper limit to damage gained through this Talent

talentList.name: Static Shield
talentList.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks. Max stacks: 7 Shield amount stacks, but duration is refreshed by every consecutive lightning strike.

talentList.name: Updraft
talentList.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%. It no longer has a duration.

talentList.name: Hammer Gains
talentList.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target. Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifiers.

talentList.name: Secret Weapon
talentList.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

talentList.name: BOOMerang
talentList.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer. BOOMerang reactivation doesn't benefit from the bonuses of Gathering Storm, nor gain stacks for it

talentList.name: Charged Up
talentList.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%. Increases Lightning Rod's maximum duration to 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Hinterland Blast
talentList.description: Cooldown: 120 seconds After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

talentList.name: Mighty Gust
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Push enemies away, and Slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Thunderstrikes
talentList.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike. Increases the damage of an untalented Lightning Rod by up to 45%

talentList.name: Flow Rider
talentList.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

talentList.name: Giant Killer
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health. Bonus damage from Giant Killer is dealt as a separate instance of Spell damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

talentList.name: Crippling Hammer
talentList.description: Increases Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 50%.

talentList.name: Aerie Gusts
talentList.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

talentList.name: Afterburner
talentList.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Call of the Wildhammer
talentList.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

talentList.name: Wind Tunnel
talentList.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back. Creates 8 additional pulses, one every 0.5 seconds Wind Tunnel's pulses inflict Knockback, but do not Slow.

talentList.name: Nexus Frenzy
talentList.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

talentList.name: Epic Mount
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

talentList.name: Advanced Targeting
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60. ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time. Type: Bonus Damage Scaling: - Affects: Self Bonus damage from Advanced Targeting is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Arsenal Synergy
talentList.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150 more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Self Bonus splash radius: 1.5

talentList.name: Mobile Offense
talentList.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes The bonus damage vs Heroes applies to splash damage as well, even if the primary target is non-Heroic.

talentList.name: Target Acquired
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

talentList.name: Inhibiting Energy
talentList.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes Slowed by Plasma Cutter Slow all enemies in the area by 35% for 4 seconds. Type: Attack modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes Additional properties: Slow

talentList.name: Warp Conduit
talentList.description: Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

talentList.name: Emergency Protocol
talentList.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Combat Advantage
talentList.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Warp Warfare
talentList.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode.

talentList.name: Divert Power: Weapons
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Activate to instantly drain Shield Capacitor's Shield, but increase Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds proportionate to the amount of Shields drained, up to an 80% increase. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Self Every percent of maximum Shield drained increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.8%.

talentList.name: Purification Salvo
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

talentList.name: Planet Cracker
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

talentList.name: Adanium Shell
talentList.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Dampening Field
talentList.description: Fenix gains 20 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Rapid Recharge
talentList.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Auxiliary Shields
talentList.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 10% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 20%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt. Type: Shield / Attack modifier Scaling: - Affects: Self This raises overall Fenix's hit points by 2%.

talentList.name: Offensive Cadence
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage. Type: Percent damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Photonic Weaponry
talentList.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Self Affects damage dealt by both Basic Attacks and Abilities.

talentList.name: Arsenal Overcharge
talentList.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Affects both Basic and Heroic Abilities, but not the Trait or Talents that have a cooldown.

talentList.name: Secondary Fire
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Singularity Charge
talentList.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1 more range. Repeater Cannon Attack Speed: 2.59/s

talentList.name: Unconquered Spirit
talentList.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown. Type: Shield Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: Keep Moving!
talentList.description: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 1 seconds. Cho's Basic Attacks against Heroes increases the duration of an active Shove by 1 second.

talentList.name: Taskmaster
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of Shove by 10 seconds. Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

talentList.name: We See You!
talentList.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 15 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

talentList.name: Double Back
talentList.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce. Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

talentList.name: Runic Persistence
talentList.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

talentList.name: Bomb's Away
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5. ❢ Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

talentList.name: Edge of Madness
talentList.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Double Trouble
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

talentList.name: Ogre Rampage
talentList.description: Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

talentList.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
talentList.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 82 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

talentList.name: Twisting Nether
talentList.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

talentList.name: Searing Shadows
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

talentList.name: Rising Dread
talentList.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

talentList.name: Twilight Nova
talentList.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

talentList.name: Shadowsnare
talentList.description: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 10% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

talentList.name: Leaden Orb
talentList.description: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Deafening Blast
talentList.description: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

talentList.name: Shadowfury
talentList.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

talentList.name: Shifting Nether
talentList.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

talentList.name: The Will of Gall
talentList.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

talentList.name: Psychotic Break
talentList.description: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Swift as the Wind
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Agile Dismount
talentList.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Pathfinder
talentList.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Shuriken Mastery
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken. ❢ Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25. ❢ Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Ability now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken. Hitting a single hero with two or more Shuriken in a single cast still counts as 1 stack.

talentList.name: Strike At The Heart
talentList.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 144 damage over 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Dragon Claw
talentList.description: Active: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, he may activate Dragon Claw to deal 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Augmented Guard
talentList.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Perfect Defense
talentList.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Dodge
talentList.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Cyber Shield
talentList.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Dragonblade
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

talentList.name: X-Strike
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

talentList.name: Shingan
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 120 bonus damage.

talentList.name: Flow Like Water
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Double Jump
talentList.description: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges.

talentList.name: Reflect
talentList.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked. All damage is dealt in Spell damage Reflected damage is dealt before Armor reductions.

talentList.name: Final Cut
talentList.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 130 damage to all enemies in the area.

talentList.name: Steady Blade
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

talentList.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
talentList.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 second. If an Hero is killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

talentList.name: Living Weapon
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds. Each individual slash applies cooldown reduction.

talentList.name: Sharpened Stars
talentList.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

talentList.name: Zanshin
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far. ❢ Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

talentList.name: Wolfheart
talentList.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 1 seconds.

talentList.name: Perfect Aim
talentList.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 35 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

talentList.name: Viciousness
talentList.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

talentList.name: Thick Skin
talentList.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%

talentList.name: Eyes in the Dark
talentList.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Insatiable
talentList.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

talentList.name: Draught Overflow
talentList.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

talentList.name: Quicksilver Bullets
talentList.description: Increases Human Basic Attack range by 20%.

talentList.name: Incendiary Elixir
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time you hit an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225.

talentList.name: Wizened Duelist
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

talentList.name: Go for the Throat
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

talentList.name: Cursed Bullet
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

talentList.name: Running Wild
talentList.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

talentList.name: Unfettered Assault
talentList.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 second.

talentList.name: On the Prowl
talentList.description: Inner Beast increases your Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Unfettered Assault
talentList.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

talentList.name: Eager Wolf
talentList.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Executioner
talentList.description: Attacking a Hero that is Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Alpha Killer
talentList.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health. Damage from Alpha Killer is dealt as a separate instance of Ability Damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor. Damage from Alpha Killer doesn't splash.

talentList.name: Unleashed
talentList.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

talentList.name: Gilnean Roulette
talentList.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

talentList.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
talentList.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target. This talent disables Greymane's melee attack animation in the Human form.

talentList.name: Tooth and Claw
talentList.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

talentList.name: Pursuit of Flame
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. ❢ Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

talentList.name: Chaotic Energy
talentList.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%. ❢ Quest: The healing provided by Regen Globes is increased by 33%. ❢ Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes your Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

talentList.name: Echoed Corruption
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. ❢ Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

talentList.name: Health Funnel
talentList.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster, while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

talentList.name: Improved Life Tap
talentList.description: Life Tap now restores 35% Mana.

talentList.name: Consume Soul
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 800 (380 + 4% per level) Health. Stores 2 charges.

talentList.name: Bound by Shadow
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

talentList.name: Curse of Exhaustion
talentList.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and slows the target's movement speed by 25% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

talentList.name: Hunger for Power
talentList.description: Increases Ability Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%. Healing from Fountains, Regeneration Globes and Biotic Emitters is also reduced. Healing from Gul'dan's Abilities and Talents is not reduced (actually his self-healing increases due to Spell Power buff).

talentList.name: Horrify
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds After a short delay, deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Rain of Destruction
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage in a small area.

talentList.name: Fel Armor
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

talentList.name: Harvest Life
talentList.description: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

talentList.name: Dark Bargain
talentList.description: Your maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but your Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

talentList.name: Healthstone
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health.

talentList.name: Rampant Hellfire
talentList.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

talentList.name: Ruinous Affliction
talentList.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

talentList.name: Darkness Within
talentList.description: After using Life Tap, the next ability you cast has 25% increased Ability Power.

talentList.name: Haunt
talentList.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

talentList.name: Deep Impact
talentList.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Demonic Circle
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Summon a Demonic Circle at your location. Activate to teleport to the Demonic Circle. Gives you two activatables: "Summon Demonic Circle" for setting up the circle and "Teleport To Demonic Circle" for teleporting to it. "Summon Demonic Circle" requires 1 second Channel and has 1 second cooldown. Teleporting is instant.

talentList.name: Target Practice
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow ❢ Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30% ❢ Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Ability Bonus range: 4.9 Bonus damage from Target Practice is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling. Only affects maximum range. Channel time for maximum range remains the same.

talentList.name: Simple Geometry
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress. ❢ Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates two additional arrows.

talentList.name: Redemption
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3 and Redemption can be lost at mamimum stacks. ❢ Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Explosive Arrows
talentList.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 75% of its damage to enemies around its target. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Minions, Monsters / Enemies (splash) Additional properties: Splash Splash radius: 3

talentList.name: Serrated Arrows
talentList.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemy Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters

talentList.name: Ignore All Distractions
talentList.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds. Type: Attack modifier Affects: Enemy Minions

talentList.name: Never Outmatched
talentList.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 40 to 20. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: The Dragon Hungers
talentList.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Self Spell power stacks are granted after the Ability has hit.

talentList.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
talentList.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Dragonstrike
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 70 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take 150% damage.

talentList.name: Dragon's Arrow
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 100 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 200 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds. After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 350 and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Fleet of Foot
talentList.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%. Consecutive hits refresh the duration.

talentList.name: Ninja Assassin
talentList.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's Cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

talentList.name: Mounted Archery
talentList.description: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

talentList.name: Flawless Technique
talentList.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 25%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 25%. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Self, Ability

talentList.name: Piercing Arrows
talentList.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets. Additional properties: Piercing (x1)

talentList.name: Giant Slayer
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 1.5% of their maximum Health as damage. Type: Attack Modifier / Percent damage Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: The Dragon Awakens
talentList.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Play of the Game
talentList.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 263 damage to each target hit by the impact. Type: Damage / Mobility: Teleport, Launch Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Targets Targeting: Automatic Cast time: Instant Teleport range: Global Launch range: 12 Hanzo is Unstoppable while in air.

talentList.name: Perfect Agility
talentList.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Bullseye
talentList.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second. Additional properties: Stun

talentList.name: Immolation
talentList.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Battered Assault
talentList.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

talentList.name: Unending Hatred
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every Minion you kill gives you 0.2 Attack Damage. Every Takedown gives 1 Basic Attack Damage. ❢ Reward: Once you reach 20 Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Attack damage. Continues to gain stacks even after the quest is complete. The damage from Unending Hatred is added to Basic Attack damage before scaling and damage multipliers.

talentList.name: Rapid Chase
talentList.description: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Friend or Foe
talentList.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used on allied Heroes without damaging them. Using Dive on an allied Hero doesn't flip you over them.

talentList.name: Unbound
talentList.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

talentList.name: Reflexive Block
talentList.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

talentList.name: Thirsting Blade
talentList.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

talentList.name: Hunter's Onslaught
talentList.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. Double this bonus versus Heroes. Bonus damage from Marked for Death Heals you, but burn damage from Immolation doesn't.

talentList.name: Metamorphosis
talentList.description: Cooldown: 120 seconds Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

talentList.name: The Hunt
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

talentList.name: Nimble Defender
talentList.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talentList.name: Elusive Strike
talentList.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

talentList.name: Sixth Sense
talentList.description: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

talentList.name: Marked for Death
talentList.description: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if you hit a target consecutively within 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Fiery Brand
talentList.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage. Damage from Fiery Brand is dealt as Ability damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor

talentList.name: Blades of Azzinoth
talentList.description: Active: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows you to activate Blades of Azzinoth to increase your Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds. You don't have to hit 5 Heroes with single cast of the Ability

talentList.name: Demonic Form
talentList.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases your Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns against you by 50%. You can now mount in Demonic Form. The health bonus is still temporary.

talentList.name: Nowhere to Hide
talentList.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. You passively reveal enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground. The Hunt still needs continuous terrain between Illidan and the target, it won't work, for example, on Haunted Mines, from inside the Mines if the target is on the surface, and vice versa. Reveal is still purely global.

talentList.name: Nexus Blades
talentList.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talentList.name: Bolt of the Storm
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Active: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talentList.name: Winter's Reach
talentList.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

talentList.name: Lingering Chill
talentList.description: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Fingers of Frost
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana Regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. ❢ Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

talentList.name: Frost Shards
talentList.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

talentList.name: Arcane Intellect
talentList.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

talentList.name: Frost Armor
talentList.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talentList.name: Ice Lance
talentList.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

talentList.name: Ice Floes
talentList.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100%, and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds per cast.

talentList.name: Icefury Wand
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 75% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1 second.

talentList.name: Ring of Frost
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds fter a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

talentList.name: Summon Water Elemental
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deak 62 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

talentList.name: Storm Front
talentList.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

talentList.name: Ice Barrier
talentList.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. This Shield lasts 4 seconds. This includes all damage dealt by Water Elemental. Shields gained stack indefinitely and every instance refreshes the duration.

talentList.name: Icy Veins
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 300% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Snowstorm
talentList.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

talentList.name: Northern Exposure
talentList.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

talentList.name: Numbing Blast
talentList.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

talentList.name: Cold Snap
talentList.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds. Center of the ring explodes 0.5 seconds after the outer ring expires.

talentList.name: Wintermute
talentList.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage. Abilities used by Water Elemental benefit from all of Jaina's Talents except Arcane Intellect. Frostbolt and Cone of Cold mimiced by Water Elemental are cast after Jaina finishes cast animation. Blizzard mimiced by Water Elemental is cast after all 3 waves of Jaina's Blizzard have fallen. Elemental casts Blizzard to the exact same area as Jaina regardless of distance.

talentList.name: Ice Blink
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Deep Chill
talentList.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

talentList.name: Put Some English On It
talentList.description: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

talentList.name: Extra-Wound Timers
talentList.description: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

talentList.name: Bouncy Bouncy
talentList.description: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

talentList.name: Taste For Explosions
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

talentList.name: Bonzer Hits
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. ❢ Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther. Quest reward increases launched target's airtime by 0.125 seconds at all distances.

talentList.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. ❢ Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 Seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3. A Steel Trap cannot be placed within 4 radius from the center of another Steel Trap.

talentList.name: Tricky Shuffles
talentList.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

talentList.name: Big As
talentList.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

talentList.name: Sticky Wicket
talentList.description: Steel Trap no longer Roots Enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

talentList.name: RIP-Tire
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Create a motorized bomb with with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement. RIP-Tire Can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475, 625, or 775 damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

talentList.name: Rocket Ride
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving. After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

talentList.name: Ripper Air
talentList.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit. Increases launched target's airtime by 0.125 seconds at all distances.

talentList.name: Bogged Down
talentList.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

talentList.name: Chattering Teeth
talentList.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes. Chase radius: 4.5 Movement speed: 2/s

talentList.name: Burst Fire
talentList.description: Frag launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

talentList.name: Endless Nades
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds. Cooldown reduction occurs for every Hero hit by a single grenade.

talentList.name: Spread Volley
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges. Cooldown starts when all affected charges are fired.

talentList.name: Extra Oomph
talentList.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

talentList.name: Puckish Scamp
talentList.description: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 70 seconds.

talentList.name: Cannonball!
talentList.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

talentList.name: BOOM POW
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds. Cooldown reduction may affect only once per mine detonated.

talentList.name: Convection
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: When Flamestrike damages an enemy Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 100. Lose all damage bonuses if you die. ❢ Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose the bonus if you die. Bonus damage from Convection is affected by Spell Power, but not by Scaling

talentList.name: Fel Infusion
talentList.description: Increases your Spell Power by 4%. Heal for 94 (+4% per level) Health when you activate Verdant Spheres.

talentList.name: Mana Addict
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your maximum Mana by 15. ❢ Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, you can also activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of your maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown. Continues to gain stacks even after the quest is complete. Kael'thas' current mana is also increased by 15, when a Regeneration Globe is collected.

talentList.name: Nether Wind
talentList.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

talentList.name: Energy Roil
talentList.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70. When Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

talentList.name: Mana Tap
talentList.description: Activating Verdante Spheres restores 4% of your maximum Mana.

talentList.name: Burned Flesh
talentList.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health. The damage from Burned Flesh is dealt as a separate instance of Spell Damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

talentList.name: Sun King's Fury
talentList.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

talentList.name: Sunfire Enchantment
talentList.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes your next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. If both of them hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Phoenix
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 damage and splashing for 50%.

talentList.name: Pyroblast
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 damage to an enemy Hero and 405 damage to enemies nearby.

talentList.name: Pyromaniac
talentList.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 second.

talentList.name: Backdraft
talentList.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemies Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Fission Bomb
talentList.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

talentList.name: Fury of the Sunwell
talentList.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

talentList.name: Ignite
talentList.description: Flamestrike applies Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb. Only 1 Living Bomb can be applied per Flamestrike cast.

talentList.name: Twin Spheres
talentList.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

talentList.name: Rebirth
talentList.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location. Phoenix now attacks 26 times during its duration dealing total of 2028 damage and 1014 splash damage. Phoenix can be relocated only once per cast. Relocating Phoenix through units deals damage, but causes it to miss out one attack.

talentList.name: Presence Of Mind
talentList.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes who are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Master of Flames
talentList.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb. Enables Living Bomb to spread indefinitely.

talentList.name: Flamethrower
talentList.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If you hit 2 or more Heroes, Flamestrike's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

talentList.name: The Plaguelands
talentList.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

talentList.name: Blighted Frost
talentList.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Barbed Chains
talentList.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Strip Shields
talentList.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times. Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

talentList.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. ❢ Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again. Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

talentList.name: Armor of the Archlich
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Accelerated Decay
talentList.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 20% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

talentList.name: Chilling Touch
talentList.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area enemies for 100% additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Ice Cold
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 5 seconds and increase its damage by 250%.

talentList.name: Frost Blast
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 damage to its target and 275 damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frozen Tomb are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Shadow Fissure
talentList.description: Cooldown: 16 seconds Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 360 damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

talentList.name: Icy Grasp
talentList.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 10%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, its Slow duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Chains of Ice
talentList.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, targets are Slowed by 60% for 1 seconds.

talentList.name: Chain-Link
talentList.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

talentList.name: Arcane Echoes
talentList.description: Whenver Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds. Every Hero hit by the initial explosion triggers cooldown reduction.

talentList.name: Hungering Cold
talentList.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

talentList.name: Power of Icecrown
talentList.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

talentList.name: Deathchill
talentList.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

talentList.name: Might of the Scourge
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Shadow Fissure resets its cooldown.

talentList.name: Shifting Malice
talentList.description: Cooldown: 240 seconds Active: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

talentList.name: The Damned Return
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Active: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay. Shade is invulnerable and untargetable and has no collision.

talentList.name: Siphoning Impact
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 points of Assimilation Shields.

talentList.name: Assimilation Mastery
talentList.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 40 points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

talentList.name: Fury of the Swarm
talentList.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splash for 100% damage around the target.

talentList.name: Sharpened Blades
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 50. Minions grant 0.5 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage. ❢ Reward: After reaching a 50 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

talentList.name: Kinetic Fulmination
talentList.description: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

talentList.name: Psionic Pulse
talentList.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

talentList.name: Queen of Blades
talentList.description: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Boundless Fury
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

talentList.name: Bladed Momentum
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

talentList.name: Maelstrom
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Deals 74 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

talentList.name: Summon Ultralisk
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes foward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

talentList.name: Psionic Barrier
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 15 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Volatile Power
talentList.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Chrysalis
talentList.description: Cooldown: 50 seconds Active: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 500 Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerate 5% of her maximum Health per second. Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effect early.

talentList.name: Mounting Potency
talentList.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

talentList.name: Painful Spikes
talentList.description: Enemies hit by Imapling blades take an additional 70 damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Unbridled Energy
talentList.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 30% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Omegastorm
talentList.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.1875 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

talentList.name: Torrasque
talentList.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born. Egg is a Summon Egg Health: 594 (+4% per level)

talentList.name: Assimilation Blades
talentList.description: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

talentList.name: Psionic Shift
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Active: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

talentList.name: Astral Presence
talentList.description: Li Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

talentList.name: Power Hungry
talentList.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self Subsequent Globes refresh the duration.

talentList.name: Force Armor
talentList.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can only gain 1 charge per cast, up to 4 charges maximum. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Aether Walker
talentList.description: If Li Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds, Teleport costs no Mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Charged Blast
talentList.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 damage. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Damage is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage

talentList.name: Triumvirate
talentList.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

talentList.name: Dominance
talentList.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li Ming's missing Health. Type: Healing / Passive Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Seeker
talentList.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 125 damage. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Zei's Vengeance
talentList.description: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, it's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Cooldown reduction is permanent. Stacks multiplicatively with Spell Power and Arcane Orbit Currently, only increases damage at max range by ~17% (Bug?)

talentList.name: Calamity
talentList.description: Teleport does 300 damage to enemy Heroes near your destination. Type: Damage Scaling: 3.00% Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Disintegrate
talentList.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

talentList.name: Wave Of Force
talentList.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.

talentList.name: Cannoneer
talentList.description: When you use an Ability, increase your next Basic Attack by 75% and cause it to deal Spell damage instead of Physical. Stacks up to 3 times. Type: Attack modifier / Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Glass Cannon
talentList.description: Increases your Spell Power by 15%, but decreases your maximum Health by 15%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Illusionist
talentList.description: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her (max) Health at once, its Cooldown is instantly refreshed. This effect has 4 second cooldown. Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%. Type: Passive Bonus range: 2 This cooldown is not reset by Critical Mass.

talentList.name: Fireflies
talentList.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

talentList.name: Mirrorball
talentList.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5. Type: Damage Scaling: 3.00% Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Arcane Orbit
talentList.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Stacks multiplicatevily with Spell Power and Zei's Vengeance

talentList.name: Diamond Skin
talentList.description: When you Teleport, gain 20% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 4 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Temporal Flux
talentList.description: Disintegrate gradually Slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%. The Slow ends and resets immediately, if target is not getting hit by Disintegrate

talentList.name: Repulsion
talentList.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%. Bonus cast range: 8.5 Bonus knockback distance: 3.75 Knockback duration stays the same.

talentList.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
talentList.description: Using abilities grants 5% Spell Power, up to a maximum of 20%. This bonus is reset when the same ability is used within a chain. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self Using any Ability twice within a 4 Ability chain resets the bonus. Upon reaching 20% bonus, the next Ability used resets the bonus. Spell Power is applied after the Ability has been cast and only the next Ability. Stacks additively with other sources of Spell Power.

talentList.name: Archon: Pure Power
talentList.description: Cooldown: 10 / 1.0 seconds Active: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing you to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities. Type: Activatable / Transformation Affects: Self Transformation time: 0.75 seconds Disintegrate toggle cooldown: 1.0 seconds Archon form lasts indefinitely once cast and can be disabled by reactivating the Ability. Cooldown starts upon leaving Archon form. Entering Archon form replaces Wave of Force and Disintegrate with Archon's Disintegrate, which has no Mana cost and can be freely toggled on and off. Archon's Disintegrate has separate cooldown from normal Disintegrate and can be used, even if latter is on cooldown. Li-Ming is unable to mount while in Archon form.

talentList.name: Sentinel Wisp
talentList.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrouding area.

talentList.name: Natural Perspective
talentList.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

talentList.name: Hippity Hop
talentList.description: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 5 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

talentList.name: Blossom Swell
talentList.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.

talentList.name: Siphoning Toxin
talentList.description: While at least one enemy is afficlted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second. When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

talentList.name: Nature's Culling
talentList.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroic enemies.

talentList.name: Splintered Spear
talentList.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

talentList.name: Choking Pollen
talentList.description: Noxious Blossom deals 75% more damage to Heroes afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 125% against enemies with 3 stacks.

talentList.name: Wild Vigor
talentList.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

talentList.name: Thornwood Vine
talentList.description: Charge Cooldown: 15 seconds Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

talentList.name: Leaping Strike
talentList.description: Charge Cooldown: 20 seconds Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 271 (+4% per level) damage. Has 2 charges.

talentList.name: Endless Spores
talentList.description: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Let Them Wither
talentList.description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

talentList.name: Greater Spell Shield
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talentList.name: bolish Magic
talentList.description: Cooldown: 35 seconds Active: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

talentList.name: Accelerated Contamination
talentList.description: While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

talentList.name: Star Wood Spear
talentList.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attacks range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Invigorating Spores
talentList.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Unfair Advantage
talentList.description: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

talentList.name: Forest's Wrath
talentList.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin. Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

talentList.name: Boundless Stride
talentList.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies. Leaping Strike can also be used on your Wisp.

talentList.name: Intensifying Toxin
talentList.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

talentList.name: Galloping Gait
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Bonds of Justice
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. ❢ Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. ❢ Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%. Type: Bonus damage (pull)/ Damage modifier (Cleave) Scaling: - / 4.00% Affects: Enemy Heroes / Enemies Heroes hit by cleaving attack that were not the main target of that attack are considered secondary targets.
