Pull bonus damage from Bonds of Justice can be affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
talentList.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Naisha's Memento
talentList.description: Active: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds. Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Type: Attack modifier Affects: Enemies Bounce range: 4.25 Basic attacks empowered by Naisha's Memento will not bounce, if Maiev is Blinded or the main target is Evading.

talentList.name: Pin Down
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. ❢ Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 15%. ❢ Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. ❢ Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Blade Dance
talentList.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Radius: 3.5

talentList.name: Sudden Vengeance
talentList.description: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes Radius: 3.5 Bonus damage from Sudden Vengeance is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage that is flagged to ignore all damage modifiers, like Armor.

talentList.name: Elune's Wrath
talentList.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 damage when it impacts. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Bonds of Corruption
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Ruthless Spirit
talentList.description: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Max multiplier: 500%

talentList.name: Containment Disc
talentList.description: Cooldown: 50 seconds Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds. Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

talentList.name: Warden's Cage
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Bladed Armor
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Chain Gang
talentList.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Shadow Armor
talentList.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Cruel Chain
talentList.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Vengenful Knives
talentList.description: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes Bonus damage from Vengeful Knives is dealt in a separate instance of Spell Damage that is flagged to ignore all damage modifiers, like Armor.

talentList.name: Armored Assault
talentList.description: While Maiev has Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
talentList.description: Active: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance. Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times. Type: Activatable Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
talentList.description: Active: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds. Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times. Type: Activatable Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
talentList.description: Active: Activate to deal 75 damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds. Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times. Type: Damage / Damage modifier Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: Unit target Cast time: 0.1+0 seconds Range: 6

talentList.name: Death's Reach
talentList.description: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%. Bonus range: 2.1

talentList.name: On a Pale Horse
talentList.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

talentList.name: Fear the Reaper
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Die Alone
talentList.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage if it hits only one Hero. Type: Damage modifier Scaling: - Affects: Ability / Enemy Heroes If any number of non-heroic targets are also hit, the bonus damage still applies, but only to Hero.

talentList.name: Throwing Shade
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 15 Heroes with Death Shroud. ❢ Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25. Bonus range: 3.75

talentList.name: Black Harvest
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds. ❢ Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Cold Hand
talentList.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Type: CC Affects: Enemies Properties: Slow

talentList.name: Massacre
talentList.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target. Type: Damage Affects: Enemies Radius: 4 This includes bonus damage from Mortality.

talentList.name: Touch of Death
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds. Type: Healing modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Tormented Souls
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Gain 10 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Last Rites
talentList.description: Cooldown: 65 seconds Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. ❢ Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

talentList.name: Soul Siphon
talentList.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talentList.name: Ethereal Existence
talentList.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Inevitable End
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks. Type: Buff Affects: Self Properties: Unstoppable

talentList.name: Shroud of Wisdom
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Soul Collector
talentList.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%. Bonus range: 1.625

talentList.name: Mortality
talentList.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 6% of the Hero's maximum Health. Type: Damage Affects: Enemy heroes Properties: Percent damage

talentList.name: Memento Mori
talentList.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Trait

talentList.name: Reaper of Souls
talentList.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 second. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

talentList.name: Angel of Death
talentList.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled. Type: Lifesteal Affects: Self

talentList.name: Final Curtain
talentList.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

talentList.name: No One Can Stop Death
talentList.description: Cooldown: 180 seconds Active: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

talentList.name: Unyielding Power
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100. ❢ Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Furious Spark
talentList.description: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 90 bonus damage. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Damage from Furious Spark does not benefit from Lightning Nova's innate damage multiplier nor create stacks for it.

talentList.name: Malicious Intent
talentList.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 15% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Self

talentList.name: Anger
talentList.description: Basic Attacks also activate Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 seconds.

talentList.name: Hateful Mending
talentList.description: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes. Type: Lifesteal Affects: Ability / Self

talentList.name: Static Barrier
talentList.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds. Type: Shield Affects: Ability / Self Bonus damage from Furious Spark, Static Field, Aminosity and secondary nova from Mimic all contribute to shield amount gained. Gaining a shield from Static Barrier while already having one causes them to stack and refreshes the duration.

talentList.name: Spite
talentList.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 100%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Makes Regen Globe tick 8 times, healing Mephisto for 14.4% of his maximum health over its duration.

talentList.name: Ghastly Armor
talentList.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Frost Storm
talentList.description: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 40% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%. Type: CC Affects: Enemies Properties: Slow Radius: 3

talentList.name: Trickery
talentList.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

talentList.name: Consume Souls
talentList.description: Cooldown: 120 seconds Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Durance of Hate
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 damage to them over the same duration. Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

talentList.name: Abhorred Skull
talentList.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Self

talentList.name: Hysteria
talentList.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

talentList.name: Shard of Hate
talentList.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target. Splash radius: 3.5 Heroes hit by splashes apply cooldown reduction from Anger.

talentList.name: Lightning Reaction
talentList.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 damage to nearby enemies. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 3 Lightning Reaction can trigger multiple times on the same cast.

talentList.name: Static Field
talentList.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 40%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health. Type: Damage Affects: Enemy Heroes Properties: Percent damage

talentList.name: Animosity
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage. Type: Damage Affects: Enemies Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant Basic Attack-created pulses from Animosity do not benefit from Lightning Nova's innate damage multiplier nor create stacks for it. Basic Attack-created pulses count towards Furious Spark hits. Splash attacks from Shard of Hate do not trigger Animosity.

talentList.name: Consumed by Hatred
talentList.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls kills a Hero it will cast again 1 additional time. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes Properties: Percent damage The bonus damage amount is calculated before the main damage is dealt. Free cast does not require channeling.

talentList.name: Unspeakable Horror
talentList.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires. Type: CC Affects: Enemy Heroes Properties: Silence

talentList.name: Mimic
talentList.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location. Shade's Lightning Nova benefits from all talents affecting it except Animosity's passive.

talentList.name: Shade Lord
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration. Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents. Type: Mobility: Teleport Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Longshot
talentList.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2. Bonus range: 1.35

talentList.name: Covert Ops
talentList.description: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second. Decoy doesn't benefit from the increased Slow

talentList.name: Advanced Cloaking
talentList.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

talentList.name: Rapid Projection
talentList.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

talentList.name: Holo Stability
talentList.description: Increases the cast range and duration of Holo Decoy by 100%. Bonus cast range: 8 Bonus duration: 5.0 seconds

talentList.name: Covert Mission
talentList.description: Active: Enemy minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster. Type: [Damage] Affects: Neutral Mercenaries Targeting: Unit target Cast time: Instant Range: 6 Charge cooldown: 0.25 seconds Support and Sentinel camps can not be bribed. Decoy can gain bribe stacks, if it dealt the finishing blow to the enemy, but not through presence.

talentList.name: Perfect Shot
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds and grants an additional damage stack of Snipe.

talentList.name: One in the Chamber
talentList.description: After using an ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Anti-Armor Shells
talentList.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower. Type: Attack modifier: Damage modifier: Physical Armor Affects: Self (attack), Enemy Heroes (armor reduction) Modified Attack Speed: 0.4/s (= 2.5 s/attack) Armor reduction is applied before damage. Decoy's attacks do not apply Armor reduction.

talentList.name: Triple Tap
talentList.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 damage each.

talentList.name: Precision Strike
talentList.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

talentList.name: Psionic Efficiency
talentList.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15%, and hitting a Hero with Snipe refunds it's Mana cost. Bonus range: 1.35

talentList.name: Double Tap
talentList.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges but it's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds. Charge cooldown: 1.0 seconds

talentList.name: Ionic Force Field
talentList.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Explosive Round
talentList.description: Snipe also deals 80% damage to enemies near the impact. Type: Damage Affects: Enemies Splash radius: 3.5

talentList.name: Crippling Shot
talentList.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Enemy Heroes Decoy's Pinning shot does not apply Armor reduction.

talentList.name: Lethal Decoy
talentList.description: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.

talentList.name: Fast Reload
talentList.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset, if it kills an enemy Hero. The cooldown is reset, if the enemy dies within 0.625 seconds of getting hit by a shot from Triple Tap.

talentList.name: Precision Barrage
talentList.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds. Charge cooldown: 3.0 seconds

talentList.name: Apollo Suit
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Rewind
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talentList.name: Sulfuras Hungers
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time you kill a Minion with Empower Sulfuras, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30 ❢ Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90. All bonus damage from Sulfuras Hungers is affected by Spell Power, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Shifting Meteor
talentList.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3% increased damage from it. ❢ Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. ❢ Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and the Ability can be recast to change its direction once per cast.

talentList.name: Engulfing Flame
talentList.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

talentList.name: Fire Ward
talentList.description: When Living Meteor hits an Enemy Hero, you gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy Ability against you by 50%. Can hold up to 2 charges.

talentList.name: Slow Burn
talentList.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Catching Fire
talentList.description: Active: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 22.5. ❢ Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talentList.name: Hand of Ragnaros
talentList.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Molten Power
talentList.description: Each enemy hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of your next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%. Hitting the same hero multiple times with the same meteor only counts as one stack.

talentList.name: Blistering Attacks
talentList.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack deals 60% additional damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second. Every single enemy including Structures triggers the cooldown reduction. Does not trigger on or empower Basic Attacks affected by "Empower Sulfuras".

talentList.name: Sulfuras Smash
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Hurl Sulfuras at the target area. It lands after 0.75 seconds, dealing 187 damage (+4% per level). Enemies in the center take an additional 594 damage (+4% per level) and are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Lava Wave
talentList.description: Cooldown: 120 seconds Release a wave of lava from your Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage (+4% per level) per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

talentList.name: Cauterize Wounds
talentList.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Tempered Flame
talentList.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, you gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Resilient Flame
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Passive: While Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%. This effect has 15 second cooldown.

talentList.name: Giant Scorcher
talentList.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal you. The damage from Giant Scorcher is dealt as a separate instance of Spell Damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

talentList.name: Meteor Bomb
talentList.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 damage (+4% per level) to all nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Blast Echo
talentList.description: After Blast Wave explodes, cast another Blast Wave on yourself. Can only occur once per cast. The secondary Blast Wave gains the same benefits from Talents as the primary one.

talentList.name: Flames of Sulfuron
talentList.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Lava Surge
talentList.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

talentList.name: Heroic Difficulty
talentList.description: Your Health and damage are increased by 25% while in Molten Core, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

talentList.name: Submerge
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Active: Activate to place yourself in stasis and heal for 600 Health (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Veteran Marksman
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%. Max bonus: 9001%

talentList.name: Ace in the Hole
talentList.description: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

talentList.name: Exterminator
talentList.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

talentList.name: Fight or Flight
talentList.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Sustaining Rounds
talentList.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

talentList.name: Behemoth Armor
talentList.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health. ❢ Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health. Max bonus health: 390000

talentList.name: Fuel the Rush
talentList.description: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

talentList.name: Unstable Compound
talentList.description: Increase the area of Give ‘Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Heavy Slugs
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Hyperion
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4 per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

talentList.name: Raynor's Raider
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee. The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

talentList.name: Debilitating Rounds
talentList.description: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

talentList.name: Rallying Cry
talentList.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

talentList.name: Giddy-Up
talentList.description: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 10% more Movement Speed.

talentList.name: Paint Them Red
talentList.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

talentList.name: Give Me More!
talentList.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

talentList.name: Bounty Hunter
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 5 Armor for 3 seconds. Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

talentList.name: Indomitable Resolve
talentList.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Dusk Wings
talentList.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor’s Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

talentList.name: Weak Spot Acquired
talentList.description: An enemy Hero who is the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper has their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Execute
talentList.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Your Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

talentList.name: Way of Illusion
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. ❢ Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage. Type: Bonus Damage Affects: Self Scaling: -

talentList.name: Way of the Blade
talentList.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.

talentList.name: Way of the Wind
talentList.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.

talentList.name: Mirage
talentList.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

talentList.name: One With The Wind
talentList.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

talentList.name: Deflection
talentList.description: Advancing Strikes grants 30 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 30%.

talentList.name: Burning Blade
talentList.description: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies. Type: Attack modifier / Damage Affects: Self, Images / Enemies Splash radius: 2.5 Bonus damage from Burning Blade is dealt in Spell damage and is affected by Spell Power.

talentList.name: Phantom Pain
talentList.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Crushing Blows
talentList.description: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds. Charge cooldown: 0.5 seconds

talentList.name: Bladestorm
talentList.description: Cooldown: 110 seconds Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 damage per second to nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Illusion Master
talentList.description: Cooldown: 8 seconds Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%. Passive: Samuro's Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%, and Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Mirrored Steel
talentList.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

talentList.name: Kawarimi
talentList.description: Wind Walk creates an Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing. If there are already two Images active, the one farthest from Samuro will be destroyed.

talentList.name: Shukuchi
talentList.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing. Type: Mobility: Teleport Targeting: No Target Distance: 4 Samuro doesn't teleport, if he is Rooted, when Wind Walk is cast, but will be Stealthed normally.

talentList.name: Merciless Strikes
talentList.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

talentList.name: Harsh Winds
talentList.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemy This bonus stacks multiplicatively with Critical Strike and Illusion Master damage bonuses.

talentList.name: Press the Attack
talentList.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

talentList.name: Dance of Death
talentList.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 25% damage.

talentList.name: Three Blade Style
talentList.description: Samuro's Mirror Images gain an additional 50% of his Health and last up to 36 seconds.

talentList.name: Wind Strider
talentList.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
talentList.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Invigoration
talentList.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

talentList.name: Block
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talentList.name: Chop Meat
talentList.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

talentList.name: Flail Axe
talentList.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

talentList.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

talentList.name: Cheap Shot
talentList.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by Slow, Root, or Stun.

talentList.name: Insatiable Blade
talentList.description: While facing the branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

talentList.name: Victuals
talentList.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The butcher heals 5% of his maximum Health.

talentList.name: Meat Shield
talentList.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability damage taken by 50%.

talentList.name: Furnace Blast
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

talentList.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Cleaver
talentList.description: Basic Attack deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target. Cleave damage is dealt in Physical Damage in a circular area around the target. Cleaver benefits from the bonus damage from Fresh Meat.

talentList.name: Savage Charge
talentList.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Brutal Strike
talentList.description: After using Hamstring, your next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

talentList.name: Crippling Slam
talentList.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

talentList.name: Enraged
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 15 Armor, reducing damage taken by 15%.

talentList.name: Blood Frenzy
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

talentList.name: Fires of Hell
talentList.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

talentList.name: Slaughterhouse
talentList.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

talentList.name: Nexus Blades
talentList.description: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.

talentList.name: Bolt of the Storm
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Active: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talentList.name: Echo of the Elements
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Kill minions or heroes within 1.5 seconds of them being hit by Chain Lightning ❢ Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25. ❢ Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning. There is 0.5 second cooldown inbetween charges.

talentList.name: Crash Lightning
talentList.description: ❢ Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounce by 12, up to 360. ❢ Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritzes boucing to Heroes. Bonus damage from Crash Lightning is affected by Spell Power and other damage modifiers, but not by Scaling. Chain Lightning will bounce to heroes first if there are any in range. Bounces between Heroes and minions respectively are still at random.

talentList.name: Rolling Thunder
talentList.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of Thrall's maximum health. Passive: Increase the number of bounces by 1.

talentList.name: Feral Resilience
talentList.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack. Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

talentList.name: Frostwolf Pack
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. ❢ Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

talentList.name: Mana Tide
talentList.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Maelstrom Weapon
talentList.description: ❢ Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. ❢ Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. ❢ Reward: After gainin 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed. Bonus damage from Maelstrom Weapon is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling. Continues to gain stacks even after the quests are completed.

talentList.name: Ancestral Wrath
talentList.description: Cooldown: 1 second Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt. Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates. 8 stacks is the upper limit and the requirement for the ability to be activated. Damage from Ancestral Wrath is dealt in Spell damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor. Does not generate Frostwolf Resilience stacks.

talentList.name: Follow Through
talentList.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talentList.name: Sundering
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 seconds.

talentList.name: Earthquake
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

talentList.name: Grace Of Air
talentList.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

talentList.name: Frostwolf's Grace
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantely heal for 150% of its normal amount. Counts as normal Frostwolf Resilience triggering for all Thrall's Abilities and Talents.

talentList.name: Spirit Shield
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy ability and subsequent abilities for 1.5 seconds. Triggering Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talentList.name: Tempest Fury
talentList.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage. Each additional hit grants Frostwolf Resilience stacks.

talentList.name: Thunderstorm
talentList.description: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds. ❢ Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice. ❢ Reward: While at 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%. Stacks are only lost when the primary target of subsequent casts is the same Heroic Target. Targetting non-Heroic units (Minions, Mercenaries, Structures...) does not affect the quest progress nor apply the Slow.

talentList.name: Alpha Wolf
talentList.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage. Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds. Bonus Damage from Basic Attaks empowered by Alpha Wolf is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage, that is flagged to ignore any Armor. This spell damage does not generate Frostwolf Resilience stacks.

talentList.name: Worldbreaker
talentList.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impasssable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Earthen Shields
talentList.description: You and your allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Nexus Blades
talentList.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talentList.name: Wind Rush
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury

talentList.name: Pulse Strike
talentList.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

talentList.name: Slipstream
talentList.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

talentList.name: Tracer Rounds
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Parting Gift
talentList.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets. The bombs are spread evenly in 120 degree intervals so that one of them is launched to the direction Tracer was facing when casting recall. An enemy can only get hit by any of the bombs once.

talentList.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
talentList.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

talentList.name: Untouchable
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

talentList.name: Jumper
talentList.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increases Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds..

talentList.name: Bullet Time
talentList.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

talentList.name: Spatial Echo
talentList.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

talentList.name: Sticky Bomb
talentList.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are Slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Quantum Spike
talentList.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health. Bonus damage from Quantum Spike is dealt in Percent damage

talentList.name: Pulse Rounds
talentList.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

talentList.name: Bullet Spray
talentList.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range. Additional enemies hit do not increase charge gained.

talentList.name: Ricochet
talentList.description: Your Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Ricochet has 5 range and bounce chance is true random. Ricocheting bullets benefit from the Tracer Rounds talent, but they do not increase charge gained.

talentList.name: Leeching Rounds
talentList.description: Your Basic Attacks against Heroes heal you for 20% of their damage dealt. Heal amount is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage multipliers.

talentList.name: Sleight of Hand
talentList.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second. Increases Tracer's effective attack speed to 6.15/s.

talentList.name: Focus Fire
talentList.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94 (+4% per level) bonus damage. This is equal to 35% of the total magazine. Focus Fire doesn't activate, if Tracer doesn't attack the target for 2 seconds, even if the clip is the same. Bonus damage is dealt in a separate instance of Physical Damage. Bonus damage is multiplied by Untouchable. Leeching Rounds heals from the bonus damage instance.

talentList.name: Locked and Loaded
talentList.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

talentList.name: Get Stuffed!
talentList.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away. Knockback distance is 9

talentList.name: Total Recall
talentList.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.

talentList.name: Composition B
talentList.description: If you successfully stick a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero, you also drop another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier. Secondary bomb also has the effects of Pulse Bomb's Heroic upgrade. The bonus damage from Quantum Spike is exceptionally halved in the secondary bomb.

talentList.name: Press the Advantage
talentList.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Dash
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. ❢ Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

talentList.name: Combat Tactician
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

talentList.name: In the Rhythm
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attack against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

talentList.name: The Bigger They Are...
talentList.description: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds and increase damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

talentList.name: Master Assassin
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. ❢ Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

talentList.name: Quarterback
talentList.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

talentList.name: Concussion Grenade
talentList.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

talentList.name: Relentless Soldier
talentList.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talentList.name: Commandeer Odin
talentList.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

talentList.name: Drakken Laser Drill
talentList.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

talentList.name: That's the Stuff!
talentList.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

talentList.name: Neosteel Coating
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

talentList.name: Spray 'n' Pray
talentList.description: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

talentList.name: Titan Grenade
talentList.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health. Bonus damage is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

talentList.name: Lead Rain
talentList.description: Overkill also Slows enemy movement speed by 30%.

talentList.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
talentList.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

talentList.name: Big Red Button
talentList.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile. Deals 319 (+4% per level) damage. Nuke impacts 1.5 seconds after Ragnarok Missiles.

talentList.name: Focusing Diodes
talentList.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%. Deals increased damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage. Damage increases in by 20% every second up to 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
talentList.description: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun. Bonus damage is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

talentList.name: Bob and Weave
talentList.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

talentList.name: Vigor
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Valeera regenerates an additional 2.5 Energy per second. ❢ Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

talentList.name: Subtlety
talentList.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote regenerate 8 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Combat Readiness
talentList.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 60%. Stores up to 3 charges. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Crippling Poison
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds. Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth. Type: Activetable / Triggered Affects: Enemies Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant Cooldown starts once the effect is triggered by damaging an enemy with an Ability. Structures are not affected by the Slow, but damaging them triggers the effect.

talentList.name: Relentless Strikes
talentList.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

talentList.name: Hemorrhage
talentList.description: Valeer's Basic Attacks deal 30% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Initiative
talentList.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 2 Combo Points.

talentList.name: Wound Poison
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds. Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth. Type: Activetable / Triggered Affects: Enemies Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant Cooldown starts once the effect is triggered by damaging an enemy with an Ability. Structures are not affected by the healind reduction, but damaging them triggers the effect.

talentList.name: Mutilate
talentList.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

talentList.name: Fatal Finesse
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 4, up to 80. ❢ Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20. Type: Bonus damage Affects: Ability Bonus damage from Fatal Finesse is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Slice and Dice
talentList.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks. Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

talentList.name: Smoke Bomb
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unreavealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

talentList.name: Cloak of Shadows
talentList.description: Cooldown: 18 seconds Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1 second, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

talentList.name: Elusiveness
talentList.description: Increase Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

talentList.name: Blind
talentList.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's blind by 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Strangle
talentList.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell power by 40% for 6 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Non-structure Enemies

talentList.name: Seal Fate
talentList.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

talentList.name: Assassinate
talentList.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10, if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Thistle Tea
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy. Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish. Type: Activetable Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Adrenaline Rush
talentList.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

talentList.name: Enveloping Shadows
talentList.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

talentList.name: Rupture
talentList.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Duration refreshing only affects damage over time.

talentList.name: Monster Hunter
talentList.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

talentList.name: Caltrops
talentList.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. ❢ Quest: Spend 180 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. ❢ Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Hot Pursuit
talentList.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

talentList.name: Puncturing Arrow
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. ❢ Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time. Bonus damage is affected by damage modifiers like Spell Power, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Punishment
talentList.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

talentList.name: Creed of the Hunter
talentList.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. ❢ Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. ❢ Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

talentList.name: Arsenal
talentList.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades, which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds. Grenades are launced at the very middle and both edges of the AoE. Grenades are unaffected by Punishment's damage bonus. A hero can't be hit by any of the grenades more than once.

talentList.name: Death Dealer
talentList.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

talentList.name: Repeating Arrow
talentList.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

talentList.name: Strafe
talentList.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Rain of Vengeance
talentList.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 240 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

talentList.name: Siphoning Arrow
talentList.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow. Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifiers.

talentList.name: Tempered by Discipline
talentList.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt. Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifiers.

talentList.name: Gloom
talentList.description: Cooldown: 5 seconds Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds. Passive: Permenantly gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

talentList.name: Frost Shot
talentList.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Seething Hatred
talentList.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Manticore
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage. Bonus damage is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor. Hit counter does not expire in time. Attacking another Hero resets the counter.

talentList.name: Death Siphon
talentList.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage you deal with Strafe is returned as Health. Death Siphon's piercing bolts are fired only for the first 3 seconds and can target the same enemy only once every 0.375 seconds. Death Siphon bolts do not prioritize Heroes. Both regular and piercing bolts heal. Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifiers.

talentList.name: Storm of Vengeance
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Rancor
talentList.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Farflight Quiver
talentList.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

talentList.name: Lion's Maw
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120 ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemies Bonus damage is affected by damage modifiers, like Spell Power, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Overpower
talentList.description: When you Parry a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage. Type: Damage modifier:Buff Affects: Ability

talentList.name: High King's Quest
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. ❢ Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns ❢ Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes ❢ Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Basic Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Basic Attack Damage. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Self Can grant total of 75 bonus Basic Attack damage. Bonus damage is affected by damage modifiers, including Colossus Smash's and Twin Blades of Fury's passive multipliers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Taunt
talentList.description: Cooldown: 16 seconds Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

talentList.name: Colossus Smash
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

talentList.name: Twin Blades of Fury
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

talentList.name: Lionheart
talentList.description: Increase Lion Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Second Wind
talentList.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt. Type: Attack modifier / Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self Properties: Lifesteal (secondary) Damage from Heroic Strike doesn't heal.

talentList.name: Victory Rush
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds. Type: Attack Modifier / Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self Search radius: 12 Effect will not trigger nor be put on cooldown, if the attack misses due to being Blinded or target Evading.

talentList.name: Shield Wall
talentList.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage for the duration. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge. Changed properties: Parry -> Protected Instead of reducing incoming damage by 100%, Parry now absorbs all incoming damage.

talentList.name: Warbringer
talentList.description: Reduces Charge cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes. Additional targeting: Allied Heroes Charging to allied heroes neither damages nor Slows them.

talentList.name: Juggernaut
talentList.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health. Type: Percent damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Mortal Strike
talentList.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds. Type: Attack modifier / Healing modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Shattering Throw
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to throw a sword that deals 50 damage to the target, and up to 1400 bonus damage to their Shields. Passive: Basic Attacks deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Targeting: Unit target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 8 Projectile speed: 28 Passive Basic Attack damage multiplier does not affect Heroic Strike

talentList.name: Banner of Stormwind
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds. Type: Summon Targeting: Point target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10 Banner Summon Type: Passive Health: 435 Health scaling: 4.00% Basic Attack damage: - Sight radius: 10.5 Unit radius: 0.5 Stormwind Aura Type: Status effect Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: - Properties: Area of Effect, Movement Speed buff Radius: 10.5 Tickrate: 2 / second

talentList.name: Banner of Ironforge
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds. Type: Summon Targeting: Point target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10 Ironforge Aura Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: - Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 10.5 Tickrate: 2 / second

talentList.name: Banner of Dalaran
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds. Type: Summon Targeting: Point target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10 Dalaran Aura Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: - Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 10.5 Tickrate: 2 / second

talentList.name: Vigilance
talentList.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.

talentList.name: Master at Arms
talentList.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds. Additional properties: Splash Splash radius: 2

talentList.name: Frenzy
talentList.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

talentList.name: Glory to the Alliance
talentList.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds. Additional properties: Healing modifier

talentList.name: Demoralizing Shout
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: 0.125+0 seconds Radius: 5.5

talentList.name: Greater Cleave
talentList.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%. Bonus radius: 1

talentList.name: Shadow Hunter
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3. ❢ Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

talentList.name: Move Unseen
talentList.description: Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed

talentList.name: Rending Cleave
talentList.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds. Type: DoT Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Tickrate: 1 / second (x3) Damage per tick: 28.27

talentList.name: Psionic Strength
talentList.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self Psionic Strength gains a stack after an enemy Hero has been damaged and only affects the following instances of damage.

talentList.name: Darkness Descends
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to gain Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds. Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed. Type: Activatable Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Wormhole
talentList.description: For 3 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from. Type: Mobility / Reactivate Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Seeker in the Dark
talentList.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds. Type: Mobility / Reactivate Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Warp Skirmisher
talentList.description: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting with Vorpal Blade causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 40% increased damage. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self Charge cooldown: 0.5 seconds

talentList.name: Might of the Nerazim
talentList.description: Activate to cast Zeratuls most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage. Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

talentList.name: Void Prison
talentList.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

talentList.name: Shroud of Adun
talentList.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Mending Strikes
talentList.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt. Type: Attack modifier / Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Spell Shield
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically. Type: Damage modifier / Toggle Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Toggle cooldown: 0.5 seconds

talentList.name: Master Warp-Blade
talentList.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Void Slash
talentList.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Also affects damage over time from Rending Cleave.

talentList.name: Sentenced to Death
talentList.description: Deal 30% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Twilight Falls
talentList.description: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

talentList.name: Gift of the Xel'Naga
talentList.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are Slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

talentList.name: Nexus Blades
talentList.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second. Type: Damage modifier / Attack modifier Affects: Self / Enemies

talentList.name: Shadow Mending
talentList.description: Heal for 75% of Spell damage dealt to Heroes. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Boneslicer
talentList.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

talentList.name: Recklessness
talentList.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.

talentList.name: Headhunter
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds ❢ Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%. ❢ Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1. Boosts both Spell and Physical damage.

talentList.name: Troll's Blood
talentList.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

talentList.name: Voodoo Shuffle
talentList.description: Cooldown: 10 seconds Activate to remove all current Root and Slow. Passive: Lower the cooldowns and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

talentList.name: Amani Hide
talentList.description: Lower Amani Rage's cooldown by 10 seconds and gain 10 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

talentList.name: Vicious Assault
talentList.description: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.

talentList.name: Arcanite Axes
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

talentList.name: Ferocity
talentList.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

talentList.name: Taz'dingo!
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

talentList.name: Guillotine
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is. This cannot be interrupted, once cast.

talentList.name: Lacerate
talentList.description: Increases Slow amount of each axe by 10%.

talentList.name: Eye of Zul'jin
talentList.description: Basic Attack against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

talentList.name: Ensnare
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: No Mercy!
talentList.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attack against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

talentList.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
talentList.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave Axes at the same time, they take 100 (+4% per level) damage and counts as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?. Bonus damage may occur in both locations where the two axes meet each other: in the mid-arc as well as in the end of axes' traveling path, i.e. at the initial cast location. After completing the You Want Axe? quest, the second revolve also applies bonus damage.

talentList.name: Let the Killing Begin
talentList.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration. Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Amani Resilience
talentList.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo. Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifiers.

talentList.name: Buzzsaw
talentList.description: After impact, the Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

talentList.name: Forest Medicine
talentList.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

talentList.name: Resilient Scarab
talentList.description: Beetles have 50 Spell Armor. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Armor Affects: Beetles

talentList.name: Nerubian Armor
talentList.description: Every 12 seconds, gain 30 Spell Armor against the next Ability and subsequent Abilities cast against you for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 30%. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Regeneration Master
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. ❢ Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health. Type: Bonus regeneration / Bonus Health Scaling: - Affects: Self Bonus regeneration and Health gained from Regeneration Master are not affected by Scaling.

talentList.name: Bed of Barbs
talentList.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that Slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 damage per second. Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Damage per tick: 21 (x4)

talentList.name: Shed Exoskeleton
talentList.description: Using Hardened Carapace increases Move Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Underking
talentList.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%. 'Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Bonus range: 2

talentList.name: Legion of Beetles
talentList.description: Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds. Can be toggled on and off. Beetles do not spawn when Anub'arak is Mounted.

talentList.name: Chitinous Plating
talentList.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 seconds, up to 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Subterranean Shield
talentList.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 point Shield for 5 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: Leeching Scarabs
talentList.description: Beetles gain 20% damage and heal you for 50% of their damage with each attack if you are nearby. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self Heal radius: 12

talentList.name: Locust Swarm
talentList.description: Deal 62 damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 21 Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Cocoon
talentList.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

talentList.name: Burning Rage
talentList.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies. Type: Damage / Passive Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Radius: 2.5 Tickrate: 1/s Burning Rage is inactive while Mounted. Doesn't damage Mercenearies that have not been aggroed.

talentList.name: Urticating Spines
talentList.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Radius: 3.5

talentList.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
talentList.description: Attacking a Hero that is Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Epicenter
talentList.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1.25 seconds for each Hero hit. Bonus radius: 1.05

talentList.name: Debilitation
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Beetle, Juiced
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle. Type: Attack modifier: Summon Affects: Self

talentList.name: Hive Master
talentList.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 damage and returns to heal you for 37 health. Type: Summon Targeting: AutomaticVampire Locust Summon type: Mobile / Invulnerable Scaling: 4.00% (both) Target search radius: 7 Vampire Locusts attacks deal Spell damage. Vampire Locust may aggro Mercenaries while Anub'arak is not Mounted. Does not attack when Anub'arak is Mounted.

talentList.name: Cryptweave
talentList.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon. Radius: 4.5 Every 0.5 seconds, if Anub'arak is within the radius and Cocoon has less than 30 health, Cocoon is healed for 2 health, up to 16.

talentList.name: Hardened Shield
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Rewind
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities. Type: - Affects: Basic Abilities Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Reactive Parry
