talentList.description: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges. Type: Damage modifier: Physical Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Amateur Opponent
talentList.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Seasoned Marksman
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. ❢ Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown. Type: Bonus damage / Activatable Scaling: - Affects: Self / Self Targeting: No target Bonus damage from Seasoned Marksman is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling. Seasoned Marksman continues to gain stacks even after the quest is completed.

talentList.name: Psionic Synergy
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy with Phase Prism grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Shield Battery
talentList.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 100% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second. Shield is considered to be inactive, if it breaks or times out.

talentList.name: Shield Surge
talentList.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Solarite Reaper
talentList.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Warp Sickness
talentList.description: Phase Prism also Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds. Additional properties: Slow

talentList.name: Chrono Surge
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Follow Through
talentList.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Self When using Twin Blades the damage multiplier is applied to the first strike only.

talentList.name: Suppression Pulse
talentList.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

talentList.name: Purifier Beam
talentList.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

talentList.name: Templar's Zeal
talentList.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Triple Strike
talentList.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

talentList.name: Graviton Vortex
talentList.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 70 to 35. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash lowers the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.25 seconds.

talentList.name: Phase Bulwark
talentList.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active, and for 2 seconds after it expires. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Titan Killer
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 0.5% of their maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades. Type: Attack modifier / Percent damage Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Force of Will
talentList.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Blades of a Templar
talentList.description: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1.25 second. Type: Attack Modifier Affects: Self / Enemies Properties: Attack Speed buff, Slow

talentList.name: Orbital Bombardment
talentList.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge. There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

talentList.name: Target Purified
talentList.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero. Retarget delay: 2 seconds

talentList.name: Zealot Charge
talentList.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%. Bonus range: 2.5

talentList.name: Plasma Burn
talentList.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 damage per second to nearby enemies. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Radius: 2.5 Tickrate: 1 / second

talentList.name: Eternal Hunger
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. ❢ Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Frost Presence
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. ❢ Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. ❢ Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. ❢ Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path. Hitbox: 1.5x1.25 Bonus range: 2.4 Missile speed: 22.1015 (Range > 12)

talentList.name: Rime
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges. Type: Damage modifier: Physical Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Frozen Wastes
talentList.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. ❢ Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. ❢ Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes. Bonus duration: 1.5 seconds Every Hero within its radius counts towards quest progress.

talentList.name: Icy Talons
talentList.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

talentList.name: Deathlord
talentList.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%. Bonus range: 1.8

talentList.name: Rune Tap
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Immortal Coil
talentList.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

talentList.name: Icebound Fortitude
talentList.description: Active: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Army of the Dead
talentList.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 Health.

talentList.name: Summon Sindragosa
talentList.description: Deals 230 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds. Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

talentList.name: Shattered Armor
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Frost Strike
talentList.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Biting Cold
talentList.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Damage bonus stacks independently for every affected unit .

talentList.name: Remorseless Winter
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Frostmourne Feeds
talentList.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

talentList.name: Embrace Death
talentList.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Bonus damage and healing percentage equals to the percentage of Health Arthas is missing. Bonus healing when self-targeting stacks additively with Immortal Coil.

talentList.name: Legion of Northrend
talentList.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

talentList.name: Absolute Zero
talentList.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Death's Advance
talentList.description: Cooldown: 50 seconds Active: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

talentList.name: Anti-Magic Shell
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented. Type: Damage modifier / Healing Affects: Self Anti-Magic Shell absorbs all incoming Spell damage, similar to Protected status. The amount of damage absorbed, and thus also healing done, is calculated after damage modifiers, such as Armor.

talentList.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Type: Buff Affects: Self Targeting: No target Properties: Movement speed, Attack speed bonus Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Endurance Stimpack
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 480 damage over 5 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Neural Stimpack
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to gain 30 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds. Type: Buff / Mana restoration Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: New Habits
talentList.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds. ❢ Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. ❢ Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds. Type: Buff Affects: Self Properties: Unstoppable

talentList.name: Feeding the Flame
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Adhesive Petroleum
talentList.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Oil Dispersal
talentList.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20% and Slow amount by 10% Increases the radius of oil puddles by 0.3, resulting in 0.6 bonus length and width.

talentList.name: Meltdown
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 5% for 2.5 seconds, up to 30%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Crossfire
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 bonus damage. Type: Damage Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Grill and Kill
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. ❢ Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
talentList.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Basic Attack / Enemy Minions, Mercenaries & Monsters Bonus splash range: 0.75

talentList.name: Bunker Drop
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 damage to enemies in a line. Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

talentList.name: Combustion
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds. Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.

talentList.name: Suppressive Fire
talentList.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 40%. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Nanomachine Coating
talentList.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Fuel Leak
talentList.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them. Oil Spills created by Fuel Leak fully benefit from all Talents affecting Oil Spill.

talentList.name: Thermal Protection
talentList.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Heat Treatment
talentList.description: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania Type: Lifesteal Affects: Trait

talentList.name: Juggernaut Plating
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage reduced by Juggernaut Plating. Type: Damage modifier / Shield Scaling: - Affects: Self Cast time: Instant Shield from Juggernaut Plating does not expire.

talentList.name: Fortified Bunker
talentList.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

talentList.name: Flash Fire
talentList.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.

talentList.name: Burn Notice
talentList.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times. Type: Attack modifier: Damage, CC Affects: Self (attack), Enemies Properties: Damage over Time, Slow Damage per tick: 3.6 (x5) per stack Subsequent attacks refresth the duration.

talentList.name: Accumulating Flame
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. ❢ Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 15 Armor for 3 second per Hero Ignited, reducing damage taken by that amount. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability (Damage) / Self (Armor) Max stacks: 5 (75 armor) Stacks do not refresh the duration and expire independently.

talentList.name: Freshest Ingredients
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second. ❢ Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking. Type: Bonus Health Regeneration Scaling: - Affects: Self Maximum stacks: 9001 Bonus Regeneration can be affected by multipliers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Elusive Brawler
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds. Type: Status effect Affects: Self Targeting: No target Properties: Evade Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Deadly Strike
talentList.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Keg Toss
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 80. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Ability Bonus range: 3.25 Charge cooldown: 1.0 seconds Bonus damage from Keg Toss is affected by damage modifiers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Ring of Fire
talentList.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 3 Damage per tick: 1/s

talentList.name: Brewmaster's Balance
talentList.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 Health per second. Type: Health Regeneration Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: Bolder Flavor
talentList.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318. Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking. Type: Shield Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self Does not increase maximum Shield value.

talentList.name: Purifying Brew
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds. While Chen has Fortifying Brew Shields, gain 30 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Wandering Keg
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds Split into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Pressure Point

talentList.name: Reinforce
talentList.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges. Type: Damage modifier: Physical Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Hold Your Ground
talentList.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Laws of Hope
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds. Passive: Regenerate 1.5 Health per second. Type: Healing / Health Regeneration Scaling: - / 4.00% (regeneration) Affects: Self Targeting: No target / Passive Properties: Heal over time Cast time: Instant Tickrate: 1 / second

talentList.name: Eternal Retaliation
talentList.description: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.5 seconds and refund 2.5 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 10 targets.

talentList.name: Conviction
talentList.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

talentList.name: Sins Exposed
talentList.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 extra damage and the mark is removed. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Subdue
talentList.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay. ❢ Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish. ❢ Reward: Punish always Slows by 80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

talentList.name: Zealous Glare
talentList.description: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 0.5 seconds. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Blessed Momentum
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Type: Attack modifier Affects: Basic Abilities

talentList.name: Falling Sword
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Johanna leaps towards an area. While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 183 damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Blessed Shield
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Deal 114 damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

talentList.name: Roar
talentList.description: Increases Punish damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 125% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Holy Fury
talentList.description: Deal 12 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 3.5 Tickrate: 1 / second Disabled while mounted. Does not affect unaggroed Mercenaries.

talentList.name: Blessed Hammer
talentList.description: Active: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 damage to enemies hit. Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Targeting: No target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Spiral radius (max): 15 Hammer radius: 0.75 Duration: 3.5 seconds Hammers spiral clockwards around Johanna, always starting from 11 o'clock and making 2 whole loops before reaching maximum radius and disappearing. Second hammer appears 1 second after the first.

talentList.name: Holy Renewal
talentList.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 health. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: Fanaticism
talentList.description: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is activate, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

talentList.name: Imposing Presence
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive:Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Type: - Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemy Heroes & Summons Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect, Attack Slow, Slow Cast time: Instant Radius: 5

talentList.name: Heaven's Fury
talentList.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Delay: 0.25 seconds Tickrate: 3.33 / second (x6) Hits up to 2 enemies per tick, chosen at random within the target area.

talentList.name: Radiating Faith
talentList.description: Increases Blessed Shield's stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

talentList.name: Indestructible

talentList.name: Hardened Bones

talentList.name: Buried Alive

talentList.name: Death March
talentList.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: Automatic Properties: Percent damage Target search radius: 7.25 Tickrate: 2 / second (x8)

talentList.name: Spectral Leech
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount. Type: Attack modifier: Damage / Healing Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes / Self Properties: Percent damage

talentList.description: Deal 40 damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Base radius: 2.5 Tickrate: 1 / second

talentList.name: Shroud of the Dead King
talentList.description: Cooldown: 75 seconds Active: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage. Type: - Affects: Self Targeting: No target Properties: Protected Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Might of Sargeras

talentList.name: Echo of Doom

talentList.name: Black Claws

talentList.name: Spreading Plague

talentList.name: Dark Conversion
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds. Dark Conversion does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

talentList.name: Deep Sleep
talentList.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

talentList.name: The Night Beckons

talentList.name: Blood Rush
talentList.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%. Properties: Movement Speed buff Doesn't require Mal'Ganis to be at full Health to trigger. Benefits from both Mal'Ganis' lifesteal against Heroes and all non-lifesteal self-healing.

talentList.name: Plague Bats
talentList.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 85 damage. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Properties: Piercing Skillshot Range: 7 Hitbox: Radius - 1.5 Arc - 90 degrees Missile speed: 19

talentList.name: Frenzied Assault
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 40% Attack Speeed and 10% increased Physical Damage for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Buff Affects: Self

talentList.name: Blind as a Bat
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Active: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds. Type: Activatable Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Cast time: Instant Fel Claws during Blind as a Bat follow the same three cast rotation as normal cast. Activating Blind as a Bat instantly refreshes the cooldown of Fel Claws, making it instantly available once active recasts have been used. Once Blind as a Bat expires, the initial cast of Fel Claws is immediately put on cooldown, disabling it. If either recast is in progress when the ability expires, the cooldown will start ticking on the background. During Blind as a Bat terrain and Mal'Ganis are visible, but you can't see any other units or abilities.

talentList.name: Seeker Swarm
talentList.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds. Type: Damage / Crowd Control Scaling: 4.00% (damage) Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: Automatic (closest) Radius: 8 Missile Speed: 11

talentList.name: Wrath of Nathreza
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds. Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch. Type: Damage Scaling: - Properties: Damage over time, Splash Radius: 3.5 Tickrate: 2 / s (x6)

talentList.name: Leap

When Sword of Justice is picked, the first reactivation increases the damage around both Tyrael and El'Druin.

talentList.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

talentList.name: Circle of Life
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes. ❢ Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health. ❢ Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe. Type: Bonus healing Scaling: - Affects: Targets

talentList.name: Flames of Fury
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet. ❢ Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Surge of Vitality
talentList.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Heat Exhaustion
talentList.description: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

talentList.name: Exuberance
talentList.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

talentList.name: Lifeblossom
talentList.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

talentList.name: Verdant Flourish
talentList.description: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes. Type: Healing modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Fire Within
talentList.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Life-Binder
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 600 over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

talentList.name: Cleansing Flame
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health. 2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

talentList.name: Dragon Scales
talentList.description: Gain 30 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Pacify
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds. Healing a Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: Unit target Properties: Slow Cast time: Instant Range: 7

talentList.name: Life Unbound
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Active: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 damage to nearby enemies. Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds. Cannot be used on Alexstrasza. Type: Healing / Damage (secondary) Scaling: -/ 4.00% Affects: Allied Heroes / Enemies (secondary) Targeting: Unit target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: Instant Range: 9 Damage radius: 3.5

talentList.name: Tough Love
talentList.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Non-Structure allies

talentList.name: Overprotective
talentList.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Allied Heroes

talentList.name: Draconic Discipline
talentList.description: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.

talentList.name: Ritual of Life
talentList.description: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds. Additional activations occur with 2 second intervals. Targets continue to receive the healing-over-time effect for the whole duration and at the same rate.

talentList.name: On Ruby Wings
talentList.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing. Alextrasza lands in the Dragon form upon triggering this talent. If Alextrasza triggers this talent, having used Cleansing Flame in the Dragon from, the duration of Dragonqueen is prolonged by 15 seconds.

talentList.name: Ancient Flame
talentList.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 25%. Type: Attack modifier / Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Attack speed gets reduced to 0.60 resulting in Basic Attack DPS increase by roughly 139% if compared to Alexstrasza's elf form and by roughly 52% if compared to dragon form. The Flame Buffet applied by this talent benefits from all talents affecting Flame Buffet.

talentList.name: Blessing of the Red
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die. Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red. Type: Bonus Health Scaling: - Affects: Non-Structure allies Targeting: Unit target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10

talentList.name: Grenade Calibration
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade. ❢ Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, its healing radius is increased by 100%, and its healing amplification applies to all sources. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability Bonus allied radius: 2.25

talentList.name: Piercing Darts
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart. ❢ Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%. Properties: Piercing (x1) Healing Dart range bonus: 3.1875 Sleep Dart range bonus: 2.9375

talentList.name: Detachable Box Magazine
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. ❢ Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart. Type: - Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant Can hold maximum of 3 charges. Healing Dart is put on cooldown until the last charge has been used.

talentList.name: Overdose
talentList.description: Hitting enemies with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.

talentList.name: Aim Down Sights
talentList.description: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled. Type: - Affects: Self Targeting: No target / Toggle Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: Instant Toggle cooldown: 3 seconds

talentList.name: Air Strike
talentList.description: 50 Mana Cooldown: 50 seconds Active: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 275% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 3 seconds to land. Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds. Type: Damage / Healing / Healing modifier Scaling: 4.00% (both) Affects: Enemies / Allied Heroes, Self / Allied & Enemy Heroes, Self Targeting: Point target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: 0.125+0 seconds Range: 45 Radius: 2.25 Air Strike benefits from all talents affecting Biotic Grenade.

talentList.name: Temporary Blindness
talentList.description: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds. Properties: Blind

talentList.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
talentList.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Debilitating Dart
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Activate to fire a dart which reduces the damage and Slows the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: Point target Properties: Clamping, Skillshot, Slow Cast time: 0.25+0 seconds Range: 11.75 Hitbox: 0.5x1.25 Projectile speed: 24

talentList.name: Nano Boost
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster. Cannot be used on Ana.

talentList.name: Eye of Horus
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures. Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

talentList.name: Speed Serum
talentList.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds. Properties: Movement Speed bonus

talentList.name: Purifying Darts
talentList.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so. Type: Bonus healing Scaling: - Properties: CC removal (Roots, Slows)

talentList.name: Smelling Salts
talentList.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Targets Properties: CC removal (Stuns)

talentList.name: Sharpshooter
talentList.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% each time it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero. Type: Bonus healing Scaling: - Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Concentrated Doses
talentList.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes. Type: Bonus Healing Scaling: - Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Contact Healing
talentList.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit. Type: Bonus Healing Scaling: - Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Nano Infusion
talentList.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt. Properties: Lifesteal

talentList.name: Ballistic Advantage
talentList.description: Eye of Horus rounds explodes upon impact, healing nearby allies for 300 and dealing 150 damage to nearby enemy Heroes. Type: Damage / Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Allied & Enemy Heroest Properties: Splash Cast time: Instant Splash radius: 3.75

talentList.name: Somnolent Doses
talentList.description: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are Slept for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Dynamic Shooting
talentList.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

talentList.name: Custom Optics
talentList.description: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4. Requires Aim Down Sights.

talentList.name: Swift Sweep
talentList.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%. Cast time: 0+0.3125 seconds

talentList.name: Increasing Clarity
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50. ❢ Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 150. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Righteous Assault
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

talentList.name: Searing Light
talentList.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Majestic Span
talentList.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%. Bonus radius: 1.05

talentList.name: Heavy Burden
talentList.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun. Properties: Slow

talentList.name: Repeated Offense
talentList.description: Passive: Increases Detainment Strike’s knockback distance by 25%. ❢ Quest: Every time Detainment Strike Stuns a Hero, increase the Stun damage by 10, up to 60. ❢ Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Self Bonus knockback duration: 0.0625 seconds There is no increase in the speed of the knockback.

talentList.name: Glimmer of Hope
talentList.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

talentList.name: Energized Cord
talentList.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 40% of the damage against non-Heroes. Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

talentList.name: Empathic Link
talentList.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope. Self-damage does not grant any energy.

talentList.name: Resurrect
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

talentList.name: Crystal Aegis
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Blinding Flash
talentList.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds. Properties: Blind

talentList.name: Converging Force
talentList.description: Enemies hit by the outer area of Sacred Sweep are pushed slightly toward the center. Properties: Knockback Knockback duration: 0.125 seconds Knockback speed: 7

talentList.name: Piercing Lash
talentList.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit. Properties: Piercing

talentList.name: Reservoir of Hope
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75. Type: Bonus resource Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Will of Heaven
talentList.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Wrath of Heaven
talentList.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Targets

talentList.name: Light Speed
talentList.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds. While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

talentList.name: Diamond Resolve
talentList.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Targets

talentList.name: Angelic Flight
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location. Type: Mobility: Launch Targeting: Point target Cast time: 2+0 seconds Range: 75 Move speed: 25 Interrupting the ability before the cast finishes doesn't put it on cooldown. Auriel is completely untargetable during the flight.

talentList.name: Shield of Hope
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: Instant Radius: 8

talentList.name: Greater Polymorph
talentList.description: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

talentList.name: Hyper Shift
talentList.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion death reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Pixie Charm
talentList.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured Mercenary. Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

talentList.name: Dream Shot
talentList.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Unstable Anomaly
talentList.description: Increase Polymporh's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Magic Spit
talentList.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Sticky Flare
talentList.description: Enemies hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

talentList.name: Peekaboo!
talentList.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Critical Mist
talentList.description: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250.

talentList.name: Blink Heal
talentList.description: Charge Cooldown: 9 seconds Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200. Stores up to 2 charges.

talentList.name: Emerald Wind
talentList.description: Cooldown: 50 seconds After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 damage and pushing enemies away.

talentList.name: Pixie Boost
talentList.description: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Safety Dust
talentList.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allied with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

talentList.name: Pixie Power
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

talentList.name: Hush!
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane FLare are Silenced for1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Critterize
talentList.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

talentList.name: Phase Out
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

talentList.name: Invisible Friends
talentList.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 Health per second and are Unreveable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

talentList.name: Intensive Winds
talentList.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

talentList.name: Speedy Dragon
talentList.description: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed.

talentList.name: Faerie Protector
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

talentList.name: Scroll of Identify
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled. Type: Damage modifier: Armor (reward) Affects: Enemy Heroes Additional properties: Revealed (passive) Armor debuff is applied after the damage is dealt.

talentList.name: Field Study
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 15% Spell Power for 14 seconds, up to 30%. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Self

talentList.name: Sapphire
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%. Only 1 Gem may be active at a time. A Gem goes on cooldown once the Horadric Cube is cast. An activated Gem can be deactivated only by activating another Gem. Cooldown between swapping gems: 0.5

talentList.name: Potion of Shielding
talentList.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 Shield for 6 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self, Allied Heroes Shields do not stack past given value. Subsequent instances refresh the duration.

talentList.name: Rejuvenation Potion
talentList.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 over 4 seconds. Type: Heal over time Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self, Allied Heroes Tickrate: 2 / second (x8) Healing per tick: 13.5 Healing-over-time does not stack. Subsequent instances refresh the duration.

talentList.name: Ruby
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 205 when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds. Only 1 Gem may be active at a time. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self, Allied Heroes Potion Radius: 0.5

talentList.name: Cube Mastery
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Kanai's Cube
talentList.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Emerald
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce healing received by 75% for 4 seconds. Only 1 Gem may be active at a time. Type: Healing modifier Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after. Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

talentList.name: Lorenado
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds After 1 second, create a swirling tome tornado that travels in the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

talentList.name: Super Healing Potion
talentList.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 80% more.

talentList.name: Potion of Revival
talentList.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 35% of the healing amount. Type: Healing Scaling: - Additional properties: Splash Splash radius: 3

talentList.name: Ancient Blessings
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 damage in an area and heal for 90 for each Hero hit. Type: Attack modifier - Damage / Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies / Allied Heroes Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect, Splash (damage) Radius: 6 Splash radius: 2.5 The damage dealt as a separate instance of Spell damage. Effect is applied only once per second. Does not stack. The bonus damage is scored to the attacker but the healing is scored to Deckard.

talentList.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
talentList.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Safety in Numbers
talentList.description: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Horadric Staff
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds. Type: Attack Modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes Properties: Stun

talentList.name: Respect the Elderly
talentList.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 2 seconds upon waking up from Sleep. Additional properties: Blind, Silence

talentList.name: Morenados!
talentList.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Bottomless Flask
talentList.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds. Once a Potion recharges, it benefits from every talent affecting Healing Potion, including this talent.

talentList.name: Perfect Gems
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 5 seconds. This talent does not require any Gem talent to be picked.

talentList.name: Transcendence
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds. Type: Attack modifier: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self, Allied Heroes Targeting: Automatic Target search radius: 5.5

talentList.name: Iron Fists
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds. Type: Attack modifier: Buff Scaling: - Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Insight
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 Mana and grants a stack of Insight. Also gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds. ❢ Reward: Once you have 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all your Basic Abilities by 1.75 seconds. Type: Attack modifier: Mana restoration, CDR Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: Spirit Ally
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allies in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 Health and lasts 10 seconds. You can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies. Type: Summon / Healing Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: Point target Properties: Self-castable Cast time: Instant Range: 9Spirit Ally Summon type: Stationary Scaling: 4.00% Health: 150 Aura radius: 8 Vision radius: 8.25 Unit radius: 0.125

talentList.name: Earth Ally
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Place an Earth Ally that reduces Heroic Basic Attack damage nearby allied Heroes receive by 50%. Has 400 Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies. Type: Summon / Damage modifier: Physical Armor Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: Point target Properties: Self-castable Cast time: Instant Range: 9Earth Ally Summon type: Stationary Scaling: 4.00% Health: 400 Aura radius: 8 Vision radius: 8.25 Unit radius: 0.125

talentList.name: Air Ally
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 / 0.5 seconds Active: Place an Air Ally that grants vision of a large area around it. Has 75 Health, lasts 40 seconds, and stores up to 2 charges. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies. Type: Summon Affects: Enemies Targeting: Point target Properties: Revealed, Self-castable Cast time: Instant Range: 9Air Ally Summon type: Stationary Scaling: 4.00% Health: 75 Vision radius: 8.25 Unit radius: 0.125

talentList.name: Blinding Speed
talentList.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

talentList.name: Heavenly Zeal
talentList.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 30%.

talentList.name: Blazing Fists
talentList.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

talentList.name: Divine Palm
talentList.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1084 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Seven-Sided Strike
talentList.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.81 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Quicksilver
talentList.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives you and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Fists of Fury
talentList.description: Increases Deadly Reach's duration by 100%.

talentList.name: Spell Shield
talentList.description: Active: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically. Type: Damage modifier / Toggle Affects: Self Targeting: No Target Toggle cooldown: 0.5 seconds

talentList.name: Sixth Sense
talentList.description: While stunned or rooted, Block all Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 75% for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Physical Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Cleansing Touch
talentList.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second. Type: Buff Affects: Allied Heroes Properties: Unstoppable

talentList.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
talentList.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each. Type: Damage Scaling: - Maximum range: 3 These basic attacks do not trigger an activated Deadly Reach

talentList.name: Echo of Heaven
talentList.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

talentList.name: Dash of Light
talentList.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 75% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Peaceful Repose
talentList.description: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

talentList.name: Transgression
talentList.description: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times. Bonus duration: 1 second

talentList.name: Storm Shield
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: Instant Radius: 8

talentList.name: Epiphany
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to restore 33% of your maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash. Type: Mana Restoration Scaling: - Affects: Self / Ability Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: Free Drinks
talentList.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health. Only grants one instance of cooldown reduction and mana refund per cast.

talentList.name: Wind Serpent
talentList.description: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Targeting: Automatic (closest) Properties: Blind Range: 7 Range calculated from the targeted ally.

talentList.name: Eager Adventurer
talentList.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 100% and increase Mana regeneration by 100% while Fast Feet is active.

talentList.name: Serpent Sidekick
talentList.description: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks an Hero.

talentList.name: Hindering Winds
talentList.description: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds. Properties: Slow

talentList.name: Safety Sprint
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active. Passive: Increases the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%. Type: Active Scaling: - Affects: Self Targeting: No target Properties: Movement Speed buff Cast time: Instant

talentList.name: The Good Stuff
talentList.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Non-Structure allies, Self Properties: Heal over time Tickrate: 2 per second Heal per tick: 7

talentList.name: Lightning Serpent
talentList.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 50% damage and healing. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: Automatic Properties: Bounce

talentList.name: Let's Go!
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet. Cannot be used on Li Li. Type: Healing / Status Effect Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Allied Heroes Targeting: Unit target Properties: Unstoppable Cast time: Instant Range: 6

talentList.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

talentList.name: Water Dragon
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Gale Force
talentList.description: Increases Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 second. Li Li's Basic Attack against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage. Type: Attack modifier / Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Surging Winds
talentList.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Self

talentList.name: Mass Vortex
talentList.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Two For One
talentList.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 seconds.

talentList.name: Pick Me Up
talentList.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health. Type: Bonus Healing Scaling: - Affects: Allied Heroes, Self

talentList.name: Blessings of Yu'lon
talentList.description: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for 1.25% of their maximum Health each time it attacks. Type: Bonus Healing Scaling: - Affects: Non-Structure allies, Self Bouncing attacks from Lightning Serpent do not grant additional healing.

talentList.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
talentList.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups hits two targets at a time.

talentList.name: Double Dragon
talentList.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another dragon is summoned at the point of impact. Secondary cast is independent of Li li's status or position, otherwise it has the same properties as the primary cast.

talentList.name: Mistweaver
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 Health. Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: Instant Radius: 8

talentList.name: Shake It Off
talentList.description: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is activate, up to 30 Armor. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self All armor is instantly removed once Fast Feet ends.

talentList.name: Caduceus Feedback
talentList.description: Increase Attack Range by 1.1, and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

talentList.name: Life Support
talentList.description: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

talentList.name: Clear!
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. ❢ Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%. Bonus radius: 0.5625

talentList.name: Cellular Reactor
talentList.description: Active: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self Targeting: No target Properties: Heal over time Cast time: Instant Tickrate: 2 / s (x8)

talentList.name: Trauma Trigger
talentList.description: Gain 30 Armor for 3 seconds if damage is taken while below 40% Health. This effect has a 30 second cooldown. Type: Damage Modifier: Armor Affects: Self

talentList.name: Blast Shield
talentList.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times. Type: Shield Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Physical Therapy
talentList.description: Safeguard removes all Slows from the target. When a slow is removed this way, reduce the cooldown of Safeguard by 5 seconds. Properties: CC removal (Slow)

talentList.name: Vanadium Plating
talentList.description: When an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 25 armor and its duration is paused.

talentList.name: Prolonged Safeguard
talentList.description: Increase Safeguard's duration by 50%.

talentList.name: Stim Drone
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Medivac Dropship
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

talentList.name: EMP Grenade
talentList.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 bonus damage to Shields. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Properties: Damage over time Tickrate: 2 / s (x4) Damage per tick: 24

talentList.name: System Shock
talentList.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Second Opinion
talentList.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Extended Care
talentList.description: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%. Bonus range: 1.65

talentList.name: First Responder
talentList.description: While above 70 energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

talentList.name: Shield Sequencer
talentList.description: Safeguard gains a second charge. These charges cannot stack on a single target. Charge cooldown: 0.5 seconds

talentList.name: Hyperactivity
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

talentList.name: Safe Zone
talentList.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds. Properties: Protected

talentList.name: Reinforcements
talentList.description: Active: Activate to call a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared by Medivac Dropship. Passive:Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds. Does not require the Medivac Dropship talent. Type: Summon Targeting: No target Cast time: 0+0.25 seconds

talentList.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
talentList.description: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales maximum Health per second.

talentList.name: We Move Together
talentList.description: Increase the passive movement speed bonus of Speed Boost to 20% (from 15%).

talentList.name: Maximum Tempo
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Speed Boost is active. ❢ Reward: Increase Amped Speed Boost to 60%.

talentList.name: Accelerando
talentList.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of Wall Ride from 20% to 40% over 4 seconds, and maintain that speed as long as you maintain the Wall Riding movement speed bonus.

talentList.name: Slip
talentList.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of Wall Ride to 70% for 1 second when near or passing through an enemy Hero.

talentList.name: Subwoofer
talentList.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 50% farther.

talentList.name: Off the Wall
talentList.description: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Chase the Bass
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave. ❢ Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

talentList.name: Party Mix
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time. ❢ Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's radius by 20%.

talentList.name: Sonic Amplifier
talentList.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's radius is increased by 50% for the duration.

talentList.name: Boombox
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Active: Place a killable ward on the ground that gives nearby allies your Crossfade and Amp It Up auras (auras do not stack). Lasts 30 seconds. Max 1.

talentList.name: Sound Barrier
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds After a 1 second delay, grant yourself and all nearby allied Heroes a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Reverse Amp
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage every second, and Speed Boost to Slow Movement Speed by 45%. This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

talentList.name: Beat Mixing
talentList.description: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, Lucio gains a 100 (+4% per level) point Shield that last indefinitely. Switching tacks again removes the Shield.

talentList.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
talentList.description: You cannot be slowed or rooted while you have the Wall Riding Movement Speed bonus.

talentList.name: Hard Style
talentList.description: Gain 25 Armor while you have the Wall Riding movement speed boost, reducing damage by 25%.

talentList.name: Back in the Mix
talentList.description: Heal for 245 (+4% per level) upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Rejuvenescência
talentList.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum health per second.

talentList.name: Bring it Together
talentList.description: If your aura is currently affecting 2 or more allies when you cast Amp It Up, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

talentList.name: Up the Frequency
talentList.description: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced to 80 from 100, and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

talentList.name: Bossa Nova
talentList.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds (from 6).

talentList.name: Nonstop Remix
talentList.description: The duration of Reverse Amp is paused while it effects 2 or more enemy Heroes.

talentList.name: Bonus Track
talentList.description: Swapping Crossfade tracks while Amp It Up is active will set Amp It Up back to its max duration. Can only happen once per cast.

talentList.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
talentList.description: Casting Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from nearby allies, and all Slow and Root effects on Lucio.

talentList.name: Rejuvenation
talentList.description: Malfurion regenerates 5 (+4% per level) Health for every active Regrowth.

talentList.name: Celestial Alignment
talentList.description: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 1 second. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

talentList.name: Shan'do's Clarity
talentList.description: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

talentList.name: Strangling Vines
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Deep Roots
talentList.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger and persist on the ground 25% longer.

talentList.name: Vengeful Roots
talentList.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that does 65 (+4% per level) damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. ❢ Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 7.

talentList.name: Wild Growth
talentList.description: Each enemy hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

talentList.name: Tenacious Roots
talentList.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 0.3 seconds. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots instantly resets. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Nature's Cure
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

talentList.name: Tranquility
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Heals nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affect by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

talentList.name: Twilight Dream
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Nature's Swiftness
talentList.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

talentList.name: Hindering Moonfire
talentList.description: Moonfire Slows Enemy Heroes by 25% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Revitalize
talentList.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Ysera's Gift
talentList.description: While above 75% Health, Regrowth's additional healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

talentList.name: Moonlit Harmony
talentList.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Nature's Balance
talentList.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

talentList.name: Serenity
talentList.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

talentList.name: Astral Communion
talentList.description: When activated, channel for 1 second and then instantly teleport to the target location and cast Twilight Dream, This shares a cooldown with Twilight Dream. Passive: Increases Twilight Dream's silence duration to 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Lifebloom
talentList.description: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

talentList.name: Lunar Shower
talentList.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown its reduces by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

talentList.name: Colossal Totem
talentList.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

talentList.name: Electric Charge
talentList.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

talentList.name: Wolf Run
talentList.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

talentList.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
talentList.description: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 55 to 40.

talentList.name: Feral Heart
talentList.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

talentList.name: Stormcaller
talentList.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.

talentList.name: Healing Totem
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Blood and Thunder
talentList.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Farsight
talentList.description: Cooldown: 16 seconds Activate to reveal an area for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area are revealed for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Cleanse
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

talentList.name: Totemic Projection
talentList.description: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

talentList.name: Ancestral Healing
talentList.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health. Cannot be used on yourself.

talentList.name: Bloodlust
talentList.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Earth Shield
talentList.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Tidal Waves
talentList.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 0.75 second for each Hero healed.

talentList.name: Earthliving Enchant
talentList.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Earthgrasp Totem
talentList.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

talentList.name: Hunger of the Wolf
talentList.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal you for 5% of your maximum Health.

talentList.name: Rising Storm
talentList.description: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 15%. Stacks up to 15 times.

talentList.name: Farseer's Blessing
talentList.description: Increases healing amount by 75%. Allies near the target are healed for 75% of the amount of health regained.

talentList.name: Gladiator's War Shout
talentList.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

talentList.name: Rewind
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talentList.name: Storm Shield
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Spine Launcher
talentList.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 second, but deal 40% less damage. Type: Attack modifier / Damage modifier / CC Affects: Self / Self / Enemies Range: 5.5 Properties: Slow

talentList.name: Fetid Touch
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

talentList.name: Low Blow
talentList.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

talentList.name: Poppin' Pustules
talentList.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.

talentList.name: One Good Spread...
talentList.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Biotic Armor
