talentList.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to its targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Vigorous Reuptake
talentList.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

talentList.name: The Long Pitch
talentList.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Growing Infestation
talentList.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Targeted Excision
talentList.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Flailing Swipe
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

talentList.name: Massive Shove
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 190 damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

talentList.name: Reactive Ballistospores
talentList.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

talentList.name: It Hungers
talentList.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 12 times, its cooldown its reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

talentList.name: Lingering Spines
talentList.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

talentList.name: Virulent Reaction
talentList.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Superstrain
talentList.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 Health.

talentList.name: Universal Carrier
talentList.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50%.

talentList.name: Pox Populi
talentList.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Controlled Chaos
talentList.description: Flaing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

talentList.name: Push Comes To Shove
talentList.description: Massive Shove slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

talentList.name: Top Off
talentList.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health. Stacks additively with the Universal Carrier healing reduction.

talentList.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
talentList.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds. Detonation instantly removes Lurking Arm, even if affected by Lingering Spines talent.

talentList.name: Psi-Infusion
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every Non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. ❢ Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. ❢ Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%.

talentList.name: Templar's Will
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. ❢ Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. ❢ Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

talentList.name: Khaydarin Resonance
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 50% Mana. ❢ Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. ❢ Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

talentList.name: Khala's Celerity
talentList.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Khala's Embrace
talentList.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

talentList.name: Khala's Light
talentList.description: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 15 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% less damage.

talentList.name: Psionic Projection
talentList.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

talentList.name: Resonation
talentList.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

talentList.name: Mental Acuity
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. ❢ Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

talentList.name: Archon
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

talentList.name: Force Wall
talentList.description: Cooldown: 10 seconds Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds. Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

talentList.name: Deep Shift
talentList.description: Dimensional Shift duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

talentList.name: Adun's Wisdom
talentList.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

talentList.name: Nullification
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Phase Disruption
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

talentList.name: Psionic Echo
talentList.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

talentList.name: Focused Beam
talentList.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

talentList.name: Twilight Archon
talentList.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Force Barrier
talentList.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Prismatic Link
talentList.description: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

talentList.name: Shield Battery
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

talentList.name: Moonlit Arrows
talentList.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.25 seconds.

talentList.name: Celestial Attunement
talentList.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

talentList.name: Kaldorei Resistance
talentList.description: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

talentList.name: Ranger
talentList.description: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit. Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 150% more damage based on distance traveled.

talentList.name: Lunar Blaze
talentList.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%. ❢ Quest: Hitting Heroes with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

talentList.name: Trueshot Aura
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 15% increased Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds. Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.

talentList.name: Everlasting Light
talentList.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 40% more.

talentList.name: Mark of Mending
talentList.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Elune's Chosen
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Shadowstalk
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

talentList.name: Starfall
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Quickening Blessing
talentList.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Harsh Moonlight
talentList.description: Sentinel Slows the target by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Ranger's Mark
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Empower
talentList.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Huntress' Fury
talentList.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Darnassian Archery
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 6 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes. Maximum stacks: 1000 (10000% bonus)

talentList.name: Eyes of the Huntress
talentList.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heal allies below 50% Health for 50% more.

talentList.name: Celestial Wrath
talentList.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes hit.

talentList.name: Shooting Star
talentList.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack against Heroes casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic target.

talentList.name: Iceblade Arrows
talentList.description: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 5% for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 10 times.

talentList.name: Silver Touch
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. ❢ Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. ❢ Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

talentList.name: Wave of Light
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. ❢ Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds. Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

talentList.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. ❢ Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

talentList.name: Holy Shock
talentList.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

talentList.name: Pursuit of Justice
talentList.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Holy Fire
talentList.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

talentList.name: Armor of Faith
talentList.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
talentList.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

talentList.name: Hand of Protection
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Divine Shield
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Divine Storm
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

talentList.name: Blessed Champion
talentList.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

talentList.name: Well Met
talentList.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Spell Shield
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talentList.name: Beacon of Light
talentList.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light. Damaging enemies with Holy Shock also grants self-healing benefit from this talent while below 50% Health.

talentList.name: Tyr's Deliverance
talentList.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Benediction
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to reduce the Mana cost of your next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Bulwark of Light
talentList.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talentList.name: Divine Hurricane
talentList.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talentList.name: Redemption
talentList.description: After Eternal Devotion ends, return to 50% of your maximum Health at your spirit's location. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

talentList.name: Divine Protection
talentList.description: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

talentList.name: Martyrdom
talentList.description: Each stack of Desperation icnreases Desperate Plea's healing by 30%.

talentList.name: Clemency
talentList.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 371 over 3 seconds while Channeling. Passive: Reduce Inquisition's cooldown by 4 seconds. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Allied Heroes Targeting: Unit target Properties: Stationary channel Cast time: 0+Ch Range: 7.5 Active range: 13 Tickrate: 2 / second (x7) Healing per tick: 53 Reactivate: Inquisition (Cancel) - Stop Channeling Inquisition (0.5 seconds cd) Shares cooldown with Inquisition. Applies Zeal on every tick. The channel gets interrupted if the target moves outside the active range.

talentList.name: Righteous Flame
talentList.description: Searing Lash deals 75% more damage to enemies who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

talentList.name: Pity the Frail
talentList.description: Allies below 50% Health receive 25% more healing from Zeal.

talentList.name: Unwavering Faith
talentList.description: Reduce Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 15. Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, gain a 250 Shield for 5 seconds. Type: Shield Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: High Inquisition
talentList.description: Casting Inquisition instantly removes all stacks of Desperation and restores 75 Mana per stack removed. Casting Clemency also grants bonuses of this talent.

talentList.name: Indulgence
talentList.description: Searing Lash's first strike restores 25 Mana per Hero hit, and its second strike restores 40 Mana per Hero hit.

talentList.name: Zealous Spirit
talentList.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

talentList.name: Fanatical Power
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to gain 50% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds. Type: Spell Power modifier / Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Self Targeting: No target Cast time: Instant Usable during channeling Inquisition or Clemency. Does not dismount on use.

talentList.name: Intercession
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation. Type: Buff Affects: Allied Heroes Targeting: Unit target Cast time: Instant Additional properties: Unstoppable Range: 7

talentList.name: Scarlet Aegis
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Divine Reckoning
talentList.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

talentList.name: Self-Righteous
talentList.description: Casting Desperate Please on an ally heals Whitemane for 125. Does not grant Zeal. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self

talentList.name: Harsh Discipline
talentList.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds. Type: CC Affects: Enemy Heroes Additional properties: Root If a hero is hit by both lashes while affected by Inquisition, only the first one applies a Root.

talentList.name: Guiding Light
talentList.description: Whenever Zeal is applied to allies other than Whitemane, it grants them 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Type: Buff Affects: Allied Heroes Additional properties: Bonus movement speed

talentList.name: Radiance
talentList.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175. Type: Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self, Allied Heroes Does not reapply Zeal.

talentList.name: Shared Punishment
talentList.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 damage every 0.5 seconds. Additional target search radius: 5 Clemency can also chain to an enemy hero. Additional target can receive debuffs from Harsh Discipline and Subjugation.

talentList.name: Lashing Out
talentList.description: Searing Lash's second strike deals 25% more damage and reduces Searing Lash's cooldown to 1 second if it hits a Hero. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Ability

talentList.name: Scarlet Crusade
talentList.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1 second. Type: Buff Affects: Self, Allied Heroes Additional properties: Unstoppable

talentList.name: Judgment Day
talentList.description: Divine Reckoning deals 30% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them. Type: Damage modifier / CC Affects: Ability / Enemies Additional properties: Displacement Pull duration: 0.1875 seconds

talentList.name: Subjugation
talentList.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 75%. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy heroes

talentList.name: Purge the Wicked
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Active: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 damage over 4 seconds. Type: Damage / Damage modifier: Armor Scaling: 4.00% / - Affects: Enemy heroes Targeting: Unit target Cast time: 0.125 seconds Range: 7 Tickrate: 1 / second (x5) Damage per tick: 60 The armor debuff is applied before the damage is dealt.

talentList.name: Pressurized Glands
talentList.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

talentList.name: Survival Instincts
talentList.description: Increases Locust's Health by 40% and duration by 40%.

talentList.name: Regenerative Microbes
talentList.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 68 (+4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Envenomed Nest
talentList.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds. Damage-over-time does not stack.

talentList.name: Prolific Dispersal
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

talentList.name: Ballistospores
talentList.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

talentList.name: Sustained Carapace
talentList.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

talentList.name: Adrenal Overload
talentList.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Needlespine
talentList.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

talentList.name: Vile Nest
talentList.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Networked Carapace
talentList.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

talentList.name: Calldown: MULE
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.

talentList.name: Ultimate Evolution
talentList.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability..

talentList.name: Evolve Monstrosity
talentList.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

talentList.name: Assault Strain
talentList.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 (+4% per level) damage.

talentList.name: Bombard Strain
talentList.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

talentList.name: Spatial Efficiency
talentList.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Soma Transference
talentList.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

talentList.name: Envenomed Spikes
talentList.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Adrenaline Boost
talentList.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Locust Brood
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

talentList.name: Volatile Mutation
talentList.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

talentList.name: Evolutionary Link
talentList.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health. Refreshes every 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Evolution Complete
talentList.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

talentList.name: Hivemind
talentList.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero. This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

talentList.name: Locust Nest
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

talentList.name: Greed
talentList.description: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds. ❢ Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to Non-Heroic Targets. Bonus range: 10

talentList.name: Gluttony
talentList.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. ❢ Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

talentList.name: Wrath
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation. ❢ Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

talentList.name: Army of Hell
talentList.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Hellforged Armor
talentList.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 armor and last 4 seconds longer.

talentList.name: Battleborn
talentList.description: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 second.

talentList.name: Art of Chaos
talentList.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

talentList.name: Bombardment
talentList.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 2 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation. Type: Attack modifier Additional target search radius: 3 The additional targets hit can grant stacks for the Wrath talent and receive its bonus damage, and also grant cooldown reduction for the Battleborn talent.

talentList.name: Master of Destruction
talentList.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 3 Annihilation per Hero hit. Radius: 3.5

talentList.name: Demonic Invasion
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 97.5 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Tide of Sin
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

talentList.name: Brutish Vanguard
talentList.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%. Type: Health multiplier / CC Scaling: - Affects: Demon Warriors and Demon Lieutenants / Enemies Properties: Slow Radius: 1.5 Slow duration: 0.5625 seconds Ticks: 2 / second

talentList.name: Cydaea's Kiss
talentList.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self Reduces periodic damage ticks by 2.

talentList.name: Chain of Command
talentList.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan’s summoned Demons. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Allies (Minions, Mercenaries, Azmodan's summons) Radius: 7 Does not increase the damage of Demon Lieutenant itself, but two Demon Lieutenants can potentially increase the damage of each other. As of Patch 2.35.2, does not increase the damage of Demon Warrior damage aura (possible bug).

talentList.name: Total Annihilation
talentList.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health. Type: Damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes Properties: Percent damage

talentList.name: Hell Rift
talentList.description: If the channel lasts its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds. Type: Summon / Damage modifier Affects: Demon Warriors

talentList.name: Sin's Grasp
talentList.description: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%. Bonus cast range: 1.25 Bonus active range: 1.55

talentList.name: Siegebreaker
talentList.description: Azmodan’s Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Azmodan's summons

talentList.name: Black Pool
talentList.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 56 (+4% per level) damage per second. Type: Damage / Damage modifier Scaling: 4.00% / - Affects: Enemies / Enemy Heroes Radius: 4 Tick rate: 8 / second (x40) Damage per tick: 14 (once per 2 ticks) Armor debuff per tick: 1 Armor debuff duration: 0.3125 seconds

talentList.name: Pride
talentList.description: After gaining 400 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation’s area is increased by 15% and its damage is increased by 125. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Ability Bonus radius: 0.6

talentList.name: Trample
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second. Type: Damage / Mobility (Dash) / CC Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Targeting: Point target Properties: Clamping, Slow Hitbox: 2.5x2.5 Distance: ~6 Movement speed: ~15 / second

talentList.name: Extra TNT
talentList.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

talentList.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
talentList.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

talentList.name: Break it Down!
talentList.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Goblin Repairs
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25. ❢ Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second

talentList.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds. ❢ Reward: After increasing duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Ark Reaktor
talentList.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds. If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

talentList.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
talentList.description: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

talentList.name: Hired Goons
talentList.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-It! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

talentList.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
talentList.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additonal enemies for 60% damage.

talentList.name: Engine Gunk
talentList.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Hyperfocus Coils
talentList.description: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

talentList.name: Robo-Goblin
talentList.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

talentList.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
talentList.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

talentList.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
talentList.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 50% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds. Does not affect structures.

talentList.name: Goblin Fusion
talentList.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

talentList.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
talentList.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

talentList.name: Turret Storage
talentList.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

talentList.name: Superior Schematics
talentList.description: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

talentList.name: Kwik Release Charge
talentList.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge. Cooldown between charges: 1s

talentList.name: Mecha-Lord
talentList.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage. Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

talentList.name: Miniature Black Hole
talentList.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

talentList.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
talentList.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage. Turret Deth Lazors do not have their damage or width increased with channeling, only the range, which matches Gazlowe's Lazor, and only benefit from Hyperfocus Coils talent. Turret Deth Lazors fire in the direction of the mouse cursor.

talentList.name: It's Raining Scrap
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Winds of Celerity
talentList.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

talentList.name: Raven's Intellect
talentList.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

talentList.name: Portal Mastery
talentList.description: Active: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form. Activate your Trait to cancel an unliked Portal.

talentList.name: Mage Armor
talentList.description: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 25%.

talentList.name: Raven Familiar
talentList.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack target for 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds. The familiar lasts for 5 seconds before expiring if no attack is made.

talentList.name: Dust of Appearance
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form. Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

talentList.name: Mystic Assault
talentList.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage and heals for 40% of the damage dealt.

talentList.name: Arcane Explosion
talentList.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.

talentList.name: Force of Magic
talentList.description: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

talentList.name: Poly Bomb
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silecing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

talentList.name: Ley Line Seal
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Circle of Protection
talentList.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds..

talentList.name: Enduring Will
talentList.description: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Reabsorption
talentList.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force Of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

talentList.name: Arcane Charge
talentList.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

talentList.name: Temporal Flux
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 1 second. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Stable Portal
talentList.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

talentList.name: Glyph of Poly Bomb
talentList.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

talentList.name: Medivh Cheats!
talentList.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

talentList.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
talentList.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

talentList.name: Arcane Brilliance
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to instantly restore 200 Mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Ability Power for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Dust of Disappearance
talentList.description: Cooldown: 10 seconds Active: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

talentList.name: Fish Eye
talentList.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies. Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Egg Hunt
talentList.description: Cooldown: 3 seconds Active: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it cast an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs. Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: A Fishy Deal
talentList.description: Active: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 32 stacks.

talentList.name: Slime Time
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. ❢ Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slimes bonus damage by 125. ❢ Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increases Slime's slow amount to 30%.

talentList.name: Tufferfish
talentList.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

talentList.name: Living The Dream
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Ability Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

talentList.name: Black Lagoon
talentList.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

talentList.name: Slippery When Wet
talentList.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Reduce the cooldown of Safety Bubble by 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Time to Krill
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

talentList.name: March of the Murlocs
talentList.description: Cooldown: 110 seconds After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

talentList.name: Octo-Grab
talentList.description: Cooldown: 50 seconds Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

talentList.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
talentList.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

talentList.name: Egg Shell
talentList.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

talentList.name: Fish Tank
talentList.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities. Slime from Toxic Buildup and Fish Oil grants lifesteal, while Slime from Egg Hunt does not. Bonus damage from Wrath of Cod also grants lifesteal.

talentList.name: Toxic Buildup
talentList.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

talentList.name: Fish Oil
talentList.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

talentList.name: Wrath of Cod
talentList.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
talentList.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

talentList.name: ... And A Shark Too!
talentList.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700%.

talentList.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
talentList.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

talentList.name: Making Inky
talentList.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Widowmakers
talentList.description: ❢ Reward: After hitting Heroes 100 times with Corpse Spider attacks, their damage is increased by 30%.

talentList.name: Pandemic
talentList.description: ❢ Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

talentList.name: Thing of the Deep
talentList.description: Passive: Increases the range of your Basic Abilities by 20%.

talentList.name: Hexed Crawlers
talentList.description: Corpse spiders restore 1% of your maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

talentList.name: Big Voodoo
talentList.description: Passive: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

talentList.name: Blood Ritual
talentList.description: Passive: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of your maximum Health and Mana.

talentList.name: Spirit of Arachyr
talentList.description: If your jar of Corpse Spiders hits only 1 enemy, it spawns 2 additional spiders.

talentList.name: Dead Rush
talentList.description: Wall of Zombies deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Toads of Hugeness
talentList.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to maximum of 100%.

talentList.name: Gargantuan
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Ravenous Spirit
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

talentList.name: Guardian Toads
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talentList.name: Superstition
talentList.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities. Basic Attacks from enemy Heroes remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Ice Block
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Active: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Spider Colony
talentList.description: Every time a Spider attacks an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Wall of Zombies and Plague of Toads by .25 seconds.

talentList.name: Ring of Poison
talentList.description: Zombie Wall last 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 822 (390 + 4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

talentList.name: Soul Harvest
talentList.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds Active: Activate to increase your Health and Ability Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

talentList.name: Humongoid
talentList.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its mana cost by 50%.

talentList.name: Annihilating Spirit
talentList.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

talentList.name: Fury of the Storm
talentList.description: Passive: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

talentList.name: Vile Infection
talentList.description: ❢ Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 150%.

talentList.name: Echo Pulse
talentList.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

talentList.name: Warp Resonance
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. ❢ Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

talentList.name: Gather Minerals
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. ❢ Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

talentList.name: Photon Barrier
talentList.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

talentList.name: Turbo Charged
talentList.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Shield Capacitor
talentList.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

talentList.name: Particle Accelerator
talentList.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

talentList.name: Rift Shock
talentList.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Tower Defense
talentList.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

talentList.name: Pylon Overcharge
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Null Gate
talentList.description: Cooldown: 40 seconds Vector Targeting. Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

talentList.name: Aggressive Matrix
talentList.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

talentList.name: Power Overflowing
talentList.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

talentList.name: Shield Battery
talentList.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 28 Shields per second, up to 112. Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

talentList.name: Quantum Entanglement
talentList.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

talentList.name: Gravity Well
talentList.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

talentList.name: Repulsor
talentList.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

talentList.name: Interference
talentList.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Construct Additional Pylons
talentList.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

talentList.name: Gate Keeper
talentList.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field. Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

talentList.name: Shoot 'Em Up
talentList.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions. Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

talentList.name: Probius Loop
talentList.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

talentList.name: Ambush
talentList.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.

talentList.name: Advanced Artillery
talentList.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

talentList.name: Maelstrom Rounds
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges.

talentList.name: Barricade
talentList.description: Concussive Blast creates an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Siege Tactics
talentList.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
talentList.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

talentList.name: Pulse Detonation Core
talentList.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Hover Siege Mode
talentList.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

talentList.name: Graduating Range
talentList.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

talentList.name: Blunt Force Gun
talentList.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

talentList.name: Napalm Strike
talentList.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
talentList.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

talentList.name: Entrenched
talentList.description: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

talentList.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
talentList.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Mechanical Know-how
talentList.description: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Executioner
talentList.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Giant Killer
talentList.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talentList.name: Orbital BFG
talentList.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

talentList.name: Advanced Lava Strike
talentList.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

talentList.name: Shrapnel Mines
talentList.description: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Ultra Capacitors
talentList.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

talentList.name: Overflowing Quiver
talentList.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, a free, untalented Withering Fire is shot. This cannot hit Heroes.

talentList.name: Dreadful Wake
talentList.description: Haunting Wave now disables Minions and Mercenaries for 7 seconds and restores 5 Mana per minion hit.

talentList.name: Mercenary Queen
talentList.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near you deal 60% more damage.

talentList.name: Withering Barrage
talentList.description: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

talentList.name: With the Wind
talentList.description: Increases Withering Fire's range by 25%.

talentList.name: Lost Soul
talentList.description: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

talentList.name: Barbed Shot
talentList.description: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talentList.name: Unstable Poison
talentList.description: Minions and Mercenaries that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 255 (121 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

talentList.name: Possession
talentList.description: Cooldown: 8 seconds Force an enemy Minion to fight for you. Stores up to 3 charges.

talentList.name: Wailing Arrow
talentList.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

talentList.name: Mind Control
talentList.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Life Drain
talentList.description: Shadow Dagger heals you for 82 (39 + 4% per level) each time it spreads to a new enemy.

talentList.name: Windrunner
talentList.description: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges your Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

talentList.name: Will of the Forsaken
talentList.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Spell Shield
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talentList.name: Evasive Fire
talentList.description: When you hit an emeny with Whitering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

talentList.name: Cold Embrace
talentList.description: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

talentList.name: Overwhelming Affliction
talentList.description: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 6% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

talentList.name: Remorseless
talentList.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talentList.name: Deafening Blast
talentList.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

talentList.name: Dark Lady's Call
talentList.description: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

talentList.name: Fury of the Storm
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talentList.name: Bolt of the Storm
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talentList.name: Olaf the Stout
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talentList.name: Spy Games
talentList.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

talentList.name: Explosive Attacks
talentList.description: Increases Baleog’s splash damage against non-Heroic enemies to 100%.

talentList.name: Viking Bribery
talentList.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant you stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

talentList.name: Pain Don't Hurt
talentList.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

talentList.name: Erik The Swift
talentList.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

talentList.name: Its a Sabotage!
talentList.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing 135 (+4% per level) damage and destroying 5 Ammo.

talentList.name: Mercenary Lord
talentList.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talentList.name: Baleog the Fierce
talentList.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

talentList.name: Mercenary Lord
talentList.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talentList.name: Spin To Win
talentList.description: Cooldown: 10 seconds Activate to have each Viking deal 222 (51 + 9 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Norse Force
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds All Vikings gain a 110 (+4% per level) to 220 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

talentList.name: Longboat Raid
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 245 (36 + 11 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 450 (70 + 20 per level) damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

talentList.name: Play Again!
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

talentList.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
talentList.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

talentList.name: Jump!
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Nordic Attack Squad
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Large and In Charge
talentList.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

talentList.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
talentList.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

talentList.name: 64 KB Marathon
talentList.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds. Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

talentList.name: Executioner
talentList.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
talentList.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

talentList.name: Checkpoint Reached
talentList.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

talentList.name: The Sequel!
talentList.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

talentList.name: Fury of the Storm
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries. Each Viking has their own cooldown.

talentList.name: Backlash
talentList.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health. Type: Damage Affects: Enemy Heroes Properties: Percent damage Radius: 3.75

talentList.name: Shackler
talentList.description: While Bone Armor is active, you slow nearby enemies by 35% for 1 Second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds. Type: CC Affects: Enemies Properties: Slow Radius: 3

talentList.name: Shade
talentList.description: While Bone Armor is active, you evade all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds. Type: Buff Affects: Self Properties: Evade

talentList.name: Reaper's Tool
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. ❢ Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectal Scythe by 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Grim Scythe
talentList.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

talentList.name: Jailors
talentList.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors that fixate on the emeny for 15 seconds. These do not count towards your Raise Skeleton maximum. ❢ Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. ❢ Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Seketal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.

talentList.name: Harvest Vitality
talentList.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes. Type: Lifesteal Affects: Ability / Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Weaken
talentList.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

talentList.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
talentList.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.2% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.5% of his maximum Mana. Type: Healing / Mana Restoration Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Poison Nova
talentList.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

talentList.name: Skeletal Mages
talentList.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

talentList.name: Echoes of Death
talentList.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

talentList.name: Rapid Harvest
talentList.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%. Type: Buff Affects: Self Properties: Attack speed bonus

talentList.name: Executioner
talentList.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds. Type: Damage modifier Affects: Self

talentList.name: Amplify Damage
talentList.description: Enemies rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds, taking 25% increased damage. Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Bone Spear
talentList.description: Cooldown: 12 seconds Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Targeting: Point Target Properties: Area of Effect, Skillshot Cast time: 0.125+0 Range: 11.9 Hitbox: 1.5x1.8 Missile speed: 15

talentList.name: Corpse Explosion
talentList.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 1.5

talentList.name: Andariel's Visage
talentList.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt. Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage. Type: Lifesteal / Damage modifier Affects: Ability / Skeletal Warriors

talentList.name: Cold Hand of Death
talentList.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%. Passive: Skeletal Warriors attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

talentList.name: Mortal Wound
talentList.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds. Type: Healing modifier Affects: Enemies

talentList.name: Kalan's Edict
talentList.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

talentList.name: Volatile Acid
talentList.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

talentList.name: Corpse Feeders
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

talentList.name: Infest
talentList.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

talentList.name: Envenomed Spines
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

talentList.name: Medusa Blades
talentList.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

talentList.name: Serrated Spines
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

talentList.name: Baneling Massacre
talentList.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings.

talentList.name: Viscous Acid
talentList.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Bile Drop
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%. ❢ Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

talentList.name: Devouring Maw
talentList.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 (+4% per level) damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

talentList.name: Nydus Network
talentList.description: Charge Cooldown: 120 seconds Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

talentList.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
talentList.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

talentList.name: Protective Coating
talentList.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

talentList.name: Spell Shield
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talentList.name: Brood Expansion
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

talentList.name: Corrosive Saliva
talentList.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health.

talentList.name: Mutalisk
talentList.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

talentList.name: Tyrant Maw
talentList.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and when you get a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

talentList.name: Endless Creep
talentList.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

talentList.name: Fury of the Storm
talentList.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talentList.name: Lion's Maw
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120 ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemies Bonus damage is affected by damage modifiers, like Spell Power, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Overpower
talentList.description: When you Parry a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage. Type: Damage modifier:Buff Affects: Ability

talentList.name: High King's Quest
talentList.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. ❢ Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns ❢ Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes ❢ Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Basic Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Basic Attack Damage. Type: Bonus damage Scaling: - Affects: Self Can grant total of 75 bonus Basic Attack damage. Bonus damage is affected by damage modifiers, including Colossus Smash's and Twin Blades of Fury's passive multipliers, but not by Scaling.

talentList.name: Taunt
talentList.description: Cooldown: 16 seconds Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

talentList.name: Colossus Smash
talentList.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

talentList.name: Twin Blades of Fury
talentList.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

talentList.name: Lionheart
talentList.description: Increase Lion Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%. Type: Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self

talentList.name: Second Wind
talentList.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt. Type: Attack modifier / Healing Scaling: - Affects: Self Properties: Lifesteal (secondary) Damage from Heroic Strike doesn't heal.

talentList.name: Victory Rush
talentList.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds. Type: Attack Modifier / Healing Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Self Search radius: 12 Effect will not trigger nor be put on cooldown, if the attack misses due to being Blinded or target Evading.

talentList.name: Shield Wall
talentList.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage for the duration. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge. Changed properties: Parry -> Protected Instead of reducing incoming damage by 100%, Parry now absorbs all incoming damage.

talentList.name: Warbringer
talentList.description: Reduces Charge cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes. Additional targeting: Allied Heroes Charging to allied heroes neither damages nor Slows them.

talentList.name: Juggernaut
talentList.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health. Type: Percent damage Scaling: - Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Mortal Strike
talentList.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds. Type: Attack modifier / Healing modifier Affects: Enemy Heroes

talentList.name: Shattering Throw
talentList.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Active: Activate to throw a sword that deals 50 damage to the target, and up to 1400 bonus damage to their Shields. Passive: Basic Attacks deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields. Type: Damage Scaling: 4.00% Affects: Enemies Targeting: Unit target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 8 Projectile speed: 28 Passive Basic Attack damage multiplier does not affect Heroic Strike

talentList.name: Banner of Stormwind
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds. Type: Summon Targeting: Point target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10 Banner Summon Type: Passive Health: 435 Health scaling: 4.00% Basic Attack damage: - Sight radius: 10.5 Unit radius: 0.5 Stormwind Aura Type: Status effect Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: - Properties: Area of Effect, Movement Speed buff Radius: 10.5 Tickrate: 2 / second

talentList.name: Banner of Ironforge
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds. Type: Summon Targeting: Point target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10 Ironforge Aura Type: Damage modifier: Armor Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: - Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 10.5 Tickrate: 2 / second

talentList.name: Banner of Dalaran
talentList.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds Active: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds. Type: Summon Targeting: Point target Properties: - Cast time: Instant Range: 10 Dalaran Aura Type: Damage modifier: Spell Power Affects: Allied Heroes, Self Targeting: - Properties: Area of Effect Radius: 10.5 Tickrate: 2 / second

talentList.name: Vigilance
talentList.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.

talentList.name: Master at Arms
talentList.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds. Additional properties: Splash Splash radius: 2

talentList.name: Frenzy
talentList.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

talentList.name: Glory to the Alliance
talentList.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds. Additional properties: Healing modifier

talentList.name: Demoralizing Shout
talentList.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds Active: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds. Type: Damage modifier: Debuff Affects: Enemy Heroes Targeting: No target Properties: Area of Effect Cast time: 0.125+0 seconds Radius: 5.5
